11121.content:
You bask in your majestic beauty. There is no other pokemon that can overthrow you. No one to tell you what to do. You were your own boss, and your word was law. You are a divine.

As you spend your first glorious day, you start to learn a thing or two about pokemon. For one, they did, in fact, communicate intelligently. Gosh, you never knew that. Second of all, they had their own kingdoms.

There was four land kingdoms, eight sky kingdoms, and five sea kingdoms. You, as it seemed, ruled all mountain realms.
And another thing you learned, some of these kingdoms weren't so friendly.

"My lord, I come with word from the Lake kingdom," a Sandslash said to you, somewhat in a panic "they want to extend their territory over this mountain range, particularly in the crater. They have given us one day to clear out and surrender before they press on with their plans!" The Sandslash looks at you fearfully, as if you would smash his skull in just for the mention.

But in order to be a good king, you must defend your kingdom. That said, you simply cannot allow others to meddle with the peace of your mountain range.

"Thank you...er..." you start. "...Kimble, my lord." he finishes for you. "Uh, yes, thank you Kimble" you say stupidly.

"Than why are we gathering an army?"Kimble asks inquisitive. "Just in case they dont quite agree. And bring some other types because of some types of water pokemon like Wishcash or Swampert." "As you wish my lord." As kimble leaves you say to yourself, "Wow that actually worked! I was just playing the role like on tv! But now i have to keep my word." So you start to head down the mountain using your kingly act like you used on kimble, and as your walking, pokemon of all different types are kneeling as you walk past. All of a sudden a little magby runs out and hugs your leg. It catches you by suprise, but you grab him up and give him to his parents. you finally meet Kimble at the base of the mountain where he quickly says, "My lord, I have taken it up upon myself to see that there are still many troops here to guard the kingdom." he said as he looked very nervous as to take an action without alerting you first. "It is quite alright," you say, "it is rather brillant." "the general has made sure that the troop is well informed." You wonder about some things for a moment and reply, "whos the general?" 1112112.content:
You bring your trusty adviser aside
"We do have a second in command, right? "
"Y-yes lord, The Prime Minister, Theodore."
The Sandslash's nervousness is very unsettling. Then again, you are now a fire-breathing amost-dragon. You'll talk to him about that later.
"Well, does he live nearby? "
"About a mile east,.. Why? "
"Be right back. " You ready your wings.
"We could just send him a message, l-lord. "
"I don't think I met him, gotta know who's gonna be in charge while I'm gone. "
"Y-yes lord. "
You fly to a network of caves. Each home to pokemon.
"This is gonna take a while"
After asking around you finally find Theodore's home. You knock against the wall.
"Coming!. " you hearhear footsteps.
"For the last time I don't wa-" a Typholsion comes up to the entrance. "Oh excuse me sire, a pokemon keeps trying to get me to try some kind of lotion to impove my red fur. I keeping telling him it's fire but he doesn't listen"
"That's okay, mistakes happen. Uh... "
"Oh yes, come inn, come in. "
This part of hollowed out earth is keeper very well, everything seems to have a place.
"I've heard about the threats to the kingdom. Any plan on how to deal with the lake kingdom? " He sits crosslegged at a flat piece of rock you would assume is a table. "
"Why yes, I want meet with their leader to see if we can avoid bloodshed. I need you to be in charge in case things gets messy. "
"Yes lord, anything else I need to know? "
"No, that should be all. "
After returning, Kimble runs up to you.
I"I just want to let you know that they agree to do a meeting to see if something can be worked out. "
"That good Kimble, we want to avoid bloodshed if possible. I don't want to see this land turned into a battlefield. "
The Sandslash stares at you, then looks away.
"What's wrong? "
"Nothing Lord, it's just, in the past. Previous rulers tend to go to war with others if something like this came up, w-which was why I was r-reluntant to tell you."
He braces himself.
You place one of your clawed hands on him, gently. "I understand, we both don't want war. This was why your my adviser, you want peace, war only leads to more war. Let's let the era of bloodlust end. "
He looks at you, seeing less of the beast you are and more of the peacemaker.

You decide, "Why not?" and follow the Odish. She takes you back to a tree where the rest of it's family are. A Vileplume, Gloom, and Bellosem. You feel wierd being around all the grass pokemon. A sharp pain burns in your stomache. You have to let it out.

The Fire is still burning in your belly. One more fight and you think it could grow into a volcano.
112111.title: One Last chance

1121111.content:
A String of fire Burns Vileplume in one shot. It collapses and faints like the others. Suddenly you glow.

It feels awsome as the white light swallows you, and you grow. When it fades you overlook yourself. You are now a lighter orange, taller, and your arms have been outfitted with sharp claws. "I just turned into a Combusken..."

"So you finally started to speak up. Well, you hurt my family just to become more powerful, you can't get away with that." You realize why it's been waiting. It's been charging an attack. "Solarbeam!" A beam of sunlight strikes you and knocks you out.

You wake up later.
1121111.title: Gain and loss

11211111.content:
You wake up, sore all over. You see the family around you with angry looks, all except Oddish. "Why did you do that Torchic? I thought we were friends?"

"Yes, Combusken, I thought you guys were friends." The Gloom says. "If what Oddish tells us is true, you are a human."

"Yes... I just went overboard when I found out how to use fire attacks." You tell them. You overlook your new claws. It was nice to have arms, but you didn't like this body at all. It was scary, and didn't feel right.

"Maybe we could turn him into an Oddish?" The Vileplume suggests.

"That might be a safer transformation..." Bellosem looked downward. "I just don't know if it's a good idea... Let's leave it up to Combusken."

"Yeah! We can still be buddies that way!" Oddish jumps excitedly.
11211111.title: Fire or Grass

choices: Beg for The Combusken body back.
112111111.content:
"Alright" You say to the family, "But why not just turn me back into a human?"

"You just attacked our entire familly. Why do you deserve such a gift?" You listen to the Bellosem taunt you. "Besides, we can only create Oddishes."

You nod and agree. Being a fire pokemon was hard. You had constant heart burn, and it was like having a fever.

They first all just gathered around you in a circle, which didn't seem all that exciting. But then they started chanting, and dancing. Moving thier arms(For those with arms), and twirling. It was one of those wonders of the world you never get to see.

But then, they all suddenly stoped, and a great sensation came through your nostrils. They were emitting some sort of spore into into the air. You took it in deeply, savouring every sniff... and eventually your body began to shift.

You could feel it all at the same time, but things morphed. The feathers on your head began to shift into three well kept leaves. Your body shrank and your wings dissappeared. Your talons then became padded feet and the colour of your body was almost matched to the skin tone of the other oddish.

You wake up to the Family of Grass pokemon... and a Combusken... towering over you.

"I thought we might never find a host." Said the Combusken.

"Yay! Look at my arms!" The Gloom was hugging itself and raving about it's "new" arms. The Vileplume was wobbling a bit, yet admiring the Flower Cap on it's head, and the Bellosem was lifting it's leaf dress and twirling around.

The Combusken was slashing at a tree and spewing Fire like there's no tommorrow. "About time."

"What's going on?" you squeak out. You're voice has become softer and more docile.

"It's kind of like evolution." The Combusken tells you. "Our family, or more like, This familly of pokemon had a special gift. They had immortal bodies, capable of special things. But they had drawbacks, they could never leave this forest, and they could never evolve."

It shoots a flamethrower at the grass and burns a perfect circle. "However, When a pokemon comes, and decides of it's free will, to become an Oddish, We can move between bodies. We Move from Oddish, to Gloom, to VilePlume, To Bellosem, To the other pokemon body, and that pokemon into Oddish."

Look where this got you. Abusing your power turned you into a Cursed Oddish. Good job. But maybe there's still time.

You quickly run behind a log and regret attacking it. You got turned into a pokemon, and it would be years before you could get out of this forrest and even search for a way back to normal.

You awake at night, in the middle of the forest.
"They ditched me?" you think, "We'll I did hurt them I guess I deserve it. I don't know what came over me." You look down at the new body you have. "We'll", you say to yourself, "atleast now I have legs."
You begin to walk foward when a Houndoom jumps out at you and growls that you are in his territory.
11211112.title: What now?

112111121.content:
"I've been ditched here, okay, chill. I don't know how long I have been here but I had no idea it was your territory" you explain. The Houndoom snarls "You should have smelled my warning!"

"If this is something a pokemon can normally do, then I'm sorry, but your out of luck. I have been changed into a pokemon, and I don't know how. I'm a human, don't you believe me?"
112111121.title: What warning?

112111122.content:
The Houndoom barks at you.

"Hey! Do you know where you are?"

Being a Combusken, pride and bravery are in your blood. Plus, this Houndoom looks hungry. You decide to force down the little voice in your head saying, "Run!", and you smirk at him. He doesn't look so strong. "Yeah," you answer back. "And I'm staying here."

"You're making a mistake. This is my territory. And whatever is on my territory, is mine," he growls. Then he pounces.

Your instincts kick in. You bounce to the right, and dodge his powerful jaws by just a few mere inches. Your fingers and claws on your hand clench, and you punch him in the jaw with incredible speed before he can react.

"Mach Punch". You stare at your hand and giggle. "Cool!"

Houndoom's jaw is broken and he's wimpering on the ground. You decide what you should do with this violent creature.
112111122.title: Your First Real Battle

choices: Stay and protect your new friend!
1121111222.content:
You bend over to Houndoom who looks up at you with a ferocious glare in his eye. You know he would attack again if you hadn't broken his jaw.

"Hey," you say softly. "Why did you attack me?"

"Because..." he growls, muffled because of his jaw, "you're a foreigner on my territory."

"I don't know where I am, I was ditched out here!" you say.

"You're in my territory of the forest. The way out is over there," he says, nudging his nose in the direction opposite to where you were facing. "I'd be happy if you would leave."

Without a word, you get up and run towards the area he pointed you too. You notice you can run a lot faster than when you were a human. You also notice it's getting darker. You can't tell if this is because it's getting late or there are more trees. Eventually, you come to a clearing, and a Leafeon breathing heavily and sniffling on a stump. She's licking her dainty brown paw, which is bleeding pretty badly. "Hello?" she asks with a worried expression.

"Hi. What's the matter?" you say.

"There's... I don't even know what it is, but I was attacked... I managed to get out, but I stumbled on a rock and cut my paw...". You take a look at it. The brown fur on her paws is slightly red, and there's a cut right under her toes in which the blood is coming out. You wince. "Ow, that looks bad...".You pull off a leaf from a nearby bush and wrap her foot in it. Eventually, the bleeding stops. "Thanks..." she says with a shy smile. "Hey, you're a Fire type, huh?"

"Yeah." you smile.

"And you're lost?"

"Yeah..." you say a little less happily.

"Let me take you to my brother Flareon. You guys could become friends, and you could live with us for a while," she said.

"Okay." you reply. Suddenly you here a rumble. "Oh no..." Leafeon mumbles.
1121111222.title: What's going on?

11211112221.content:
Suddenly, a large lion like Pokemon jumps in front of you.

"HER... YOUR LITTLE FRIEND, SHE IS MINE!" it says in a menacing voice. Leafeon looks at it in terror.

"Entei..." you say with a gasp. The same courage works up within you and you protect your friend. The selfishness you showed against Oddish and friends earlier was gone. You didn't know why, but as a Combusken you seemed more mature.

Entei growls. "SO, LITTLE ONE. YOU THINK YOU CAN TAKE ME? ENTEI, THE LEGENDARY FIRE POKEMON! THE ONE WHO AWAKENS VOLCANOES WITH A MERE ROAR? DOES ANY OF THIS NOT SCARE YOU?"

"No," you say calmly, and lunge at him with a Mach Punch. You strike him square in the nose.

"RAAAKKRREAFAAAA!" he screams and targets you with Flare Blitz. You try a Flamethrower, but it's blown away. He crushes you and everything goes black.



In your dreams you hear a sweet song. You don't know what it is, but it is one of the most beautiful things you have ever heard. Eventually, you feel warm and comforted.


Then everything comes back.

You awaken to see Entei sound asleep. And Leafeon has her paw on you, with her eyes closed and glowing. Not only did Grass Whistle put Entei to sleep, but her Synthensis move revived you. She motions for you to follow her, and sneaks past Entei. You do the same until you're out of the forest and at the entrance to a cave. You thank her as you walk in, and she nods.

"Flareon's in here" she says.

Meowth then told them to stop and suggest to give it to the boss "I bet he will enjoy it" he said as he descried what their boss would say at getting this pokemon. James stares at the pokeball wondering what to do.
113122112.title: You remain in the pokeball

11312212.content:
"Tell them I don't belong in a pokeball" you say to Meowth. The Meowth looks at you "I don't have a pokeball either but...you ARE a pokemon" he says. "But you don't understand..." you say, not finishing.

The purple-haired teen is getting annoyed and is ready to throw it at you. Meowth sighs and says "He says he doesn't want to be in a pokeball, James". James lowers the pokeball, looking disappointed.

"Well time to turn in. It getting late" Jessi says after a while "Be ready to run tomorrow, Arcanine" she adds. She gives a small hug around your gigantic neck. Creepy.

You settle down, curled up on the ground. Your first night as a pokemon. You were about to try and sleep when the Rocket trio huddles up around you. You wanted to shake them off, but on second thought, you must be really warm. So instead, you put your head down and rest.

The next morning...
11312212.title: Sweet dreams

113122121.content:
you slowly open your eyes as the sun shines brightly on you. Looking around, you see everyone is still asleep and there is still some stew left over in the pot. Feeling hungry, you stick your entire face in the pot and start eating. "Yuck, it's cold," you mutter, careful not to wake your sleeping comrades.

Not going to eat cold stew, you look at the pot and think I can heat this. Slowly you focus entirely on emitting fire and as you do, fire builds within your stomach, rising to your mouth. Holding it in for a moment, you could feel it get stronger and stronger. As you open your mouth a giant flamethrower comes out, engulfing the pot.

"Oh no," you realize as you quickly close your mouth. But it was too late. The pot was burned to a crisp and the stew was steaming like a train. Although, the stew did smell good now. You sniff it again and approach the pot. Carefully tasting it, the boiling water seems to have no effect on you. Wasting no more time you dig in, finishing off the entire pot.

"Our food!" you hear Jessi yell. Turning around, you see Jessi staring in shock at you. Meowth and James were also looking at you.

"Sorry, I was hungry," you tell them as Meowth translated. Meowth tells you, "One rule: Do not eat all the food or you won't like what happens."

Jessi looking at you with fire burning in her eyes says, "As punishment carry us to the mountain up ahead. We have business there."

James looking at you and then Jessi says, "You better do what she says." Whispering in your ear he adds, "She is obsessed with food and is very temperamental.
113122121.title: Breakfast

choices: Decide to explore a little more
113122122.content:
"Wake up, sleepy head!" Jessi is pulling your ears. You shake your head, and look up with a groggy expression. You stand up slowly, then bend down in a bow, stretching.

"We were considering, since you won't travel in a pokeball, that you can run instead". You tilt your head in confusion. But it doesn't last long. Soon you feel a lump on your shoulders. You turn you head a little so you can see on your back.

James and Meowth have climbed onto your back. This is getting weird. "Listen, we want to head north. Towards Foretree, you see, we're trying to catch up with somebody. They have something that is very important to us" and with that, Jessi joined the other two on your back.

So now you know you must be south of Foretree. You're in Hoenn. You wonder what two teens and a Meowth could possibly be trying to achieve by following somebody.

None the less, you start to move. Maybe if you helped them, they could bring you one step closer to finding out the truth.

Your trot eventually turns into a dash as you exit out of the clump of trees. The sky looks stormy, and there is tall grass almost everywhere. A tall building stands strong in the distance, and there is a long river running past a ways down that leads to the ocean.

As you run you can often hear unmistakable "Whees" and "Woos" from your back. You try to ignore them.
113122122.title: Hitching a ride

You hear the un mistakable voice of jessi say once you stop. James sticks up for you, "jess, arcanine is a fire type, no matter how strong he is, he could die if he gets stuck in something like that." Just then you catch the scent of food. You turn and dash towards where the scent is coming from, causing your riders to be thrown around. Three seconds later you come apon a campsite, with three people and a pikachu sitting around a fire, food in their hands. "It's the twerps!" Meoth exclaims when he sees them. The trainers turn around, "team rocket!" Jess, james and meowth jump off your back, facing the trainers. Nobody notices as you sneak around to the food and start eating, jess, james and meowth by now have finished their monologing. "And now we have a heavy hitter in our group." The trainer with slits for eyes(brock) laughs, "why would anyone join you?" You lift your head from the food, full, and bark translation: "I would!" The trainers stare as you walk back over tou team rocket, and sit down. "What?!?!" "We'll be taking that pikachu now." Jess says smugly, hearing that you jerk your head to face her. "What?! You're trying to steal a pokemon?!" I bark out. Meowth turns to me, "yep that's what team rocket does!" He says smiling. I get up and take a few steps back, crouching, hackles raised, snarling. Meowth is worried, "hey james, what does it mean when an arcainine is snarling?" "Ummm oh, it means he finds you an enemy and will attack if you don't leave soon, why?" I the release a powerful flamethrower, burnning and sending them flying. "That's why, well easy come, easy go." "Were blasting off again!" Once they're gone I turn to leave when one of the trainers runs ahead of me, cutting me off. "Arcainine want to battle?" He asks me pulling out a pokeball. I shake my head and walk past him and right into the path of a seviper, which attacks with poison tail. The attack hits me right in the face, knocking me out and poisoning me. The group chases the seviper away, while brock examines me. "This is bad, he's been poisoned, and there are no pecha berries around here." "Foretree should be just up the road we should be able to get there before anything else happens." Ash says, just before a torrential rain begins. When the first few drops hit me, I twitch I pain, then I start howling I agony as the rain picks up.

1132.content:
You stare at the Donphan in wonder. Can you really be seeing this? Doing this? You have little time to reflect, though, as the pokemon comes running at you, white tusks gleaming deadly in the sunlight.

Your thoughts race as you try to remember what exactly the Donphan can do. Is it really wise to fight it? It doesn't matter, you decide. The thing's coming at you whether you like it or not.

You race to meet the Donphan, howling with all your Archenine might. Your heads meet, and the collision shakes the earth. Out of the corner of your eye you see wild pokemon lift their heads to watch the confrontation. The Donphan before you is getting ready to attack again when you shift your eyes back to him.

You quickly...
1132.title: Encounter

choices: Listen to what the Xatu has to say
11321.content:
You feel something burning deep in your body, and it wants out. It crawls up your throat, and is pounding against your teeth. It pushes, and builds, and finally...

...escapes. You open you mouth and a flamethrower spills out in desperation. It rushes towards the Donphan at breakneck speed, colliding with a flash. Behind the action, flames continue to spill from your mouth. Suddenly, you start losing your breath, and close your mouth.

The fire, which you could have sworn just chuckled, creeps back down your throat. You look up at the Donphan. It now looked more like a burnt kabob, and was unconscious. You grin in silent victory.

The pokemon that were watching started to cheer in a manifold as you nervously took in the glory. Then, from the crowd, a Xatu steps up to you, and the crowd grows silent.

The Xatu seemed to be important to the area, so you sit as respectfully as you can. The Xatu spoke "We've been expecting you..."

all they do is catch a wild pokemon, and take it to the master. the master looks at it and sometimes even talks to it, and then releases the pokemon and give the trainer who caught the best pokemon a prize. this was good and fine. however, a little while ago the pokemon who where taken stoped coming back. we think this may have somthing to do with the locked house in the village. the house was inhabited by Gurnhail-" you interupt asking " Who's Gurnhail?" and the Xatu replies, obveuosly anoyed at being interupted, "Gurnhail was a strange ghost pokemon, the likes of which we have never seen before. Anyway, Gurnhail disapeard just befor the pokemon started disapearing. we think somthing else now ocupise the house, and the prohposey me own father said as he deid stated that in our time of need a new champion whould defeat the old, return the lost and unite pokemon and peaple. choices: Forest (You run into a group of grass types)
Factory (You run into a group of electric types)
11322.content:
When the Donphan looks at you it trumpets its trunk and stomps.

"You get out of my territory right now you intruder!" the Donphan roars in a rough yet feminine voice. You pause for a second, trying to figure out whats going on.

"What are you talking about? I didn't do anything."

"Liar! Everyone knows that this is my land and that they aren't supposed to intrude!" she insists, "Now go before I make you pay Arcanine."

"My name isn't Arcanine," you growl at her in annoyance. "Anyway I have better places to be right now."

Slowly you walk off, Donphan still glaring. You currently could care less about her, but needed to find someone who was human or who could help you. Looking around you see a forest and a factory.

'The forest has a path, but the factory looks well kept. Either the facory might have someone in it or the path'll lead me to a town or city.' You reason. Eventually you go to the...
11322.title: Mistaken identity.

113221.content:
You decided to go to the forest, so you quickly ran off into it's interior. You bravely ran through the forest on four swift legs, careful not to trip over or run into anything. You eventually reached what you think was the exit. As you were about to get out of the exit, a voice called out, "Stop right there!"

You turned around to meet the glare of a large creature with some sort of bulb on it's back. You saw two larger creatures behind the smaller one, one with a blooming flower on it's back and the largest one with a fully grown plant on it's back. "We are not letting you leave!" The smallest one called out to you.

"Why?" You questioned, not remembering any wrong acts you did in the forest while you sprinted through it. "You are an intruder to our forest, you are not leaving without a fight." The medium-sized one answered, vines coming out the sides of it's bulb. "Who are you?" You asked while trying to keep a calm expression on your face.

"Why should we tell you? Aren't you a Pokemon too?" The biggest one replied angrily, stomping a single foot onto the ground angrily. You suddenly remembered who the Pokemon were after you were dumbstruck for a few moments. "Listen, I don't want a fight, I will leave quickly." You tried to reason with them, even though they had the same angered expressions on their faces.

You know they would probably lose against you anyway, you being a fire-type and all. "We are not going to listen to your petty reasoning, we demand a fight!" The Venusaur snapped angrily, eyes narrowing.

You knew you had only two possible choices, to reason with them or fight them. You wondered which choice to make.
113221.title: Forest (You run into a group of grass types)

114.content:
Your body feels slick, nimble, and burning hot. But you can only make out the cute face and navy marks before something hit you hard on your head.

"Keep marching, soldier! No time to stare at water all day, your not going to find them here!" you look up at your confronter, a Magmar towering over you. You look behind you to see a parade of different fire pokemon, waiting for you to join into the empty gap next to a Charmander. You quickly fill the void and the crowd begins to march again, urging you to keep the tune going.

Overhead, tall rock spires stuck out of the ground, pokemon perched on the peaks. The stars twinkled up from above in the midnight sky. You could tell something was wrong.

You feel a tap on your shoulder, and look to your right. "What has gotten into you, man?" the Charmander whispered "The chief has had to stop you at least a couple times now!" you didn't know what to say. You were so confused.
114.title: A midnight march

114132.title: WHERE AM I

1142.content:
This was getting really weird. Was there some sort of big battle about to happen? Your suspicions were all born fresh from your mind like crazy, one after another. The questions piled up. But sometimes, it's just better to find out on your own.

You marched on silently for what seemed like hours. Often, the only sound you would hear were the pokemon in their silent march, or the sound of a creek or river flowing by. Maybe even a slight exchange of whispers from around you.

Your small paws prodded the desert sand, getting used to the manner of which you were walking in unison. In the distance, few pokemon gathered at an oasis. Desert pokemon, sandshrews, trapinch, cacnea, and other various pokemon. And it all only made you want to join them.

In fact, maybe you can sneak out of this stupid thing. What was the point, anyway? The thought raced through your mind like a speed kart.

Suddenly, the line stopped, and you bumped into the numel in front of you. "What's the big idea?" you complain. The charmander gives you sharp jab in your side. The line stopped at a huge tower. It looked ancient, like it would crumble at even the slightest bit of extra weight.

"Today is the day, soldiers. Remember your instructions; enter single file, work together, reach the top, and gain your strength. Then return to me and we will continue onwards" the chief said in a deep growl.

What did he mean by "gain your strength"?
1142.title: Finding the power...er...tower

You dart off unnoticed, and run until you can't run any longer. You glance up to see that you've stopped at a large tree with a vine hanging down.
11422.title: Escape

114222.content:
You feel extremely tired and decide to sleep behind the tree and relax. Being transformed into a pokemon and having to sprint faster than you ever have sprinted before takes a lot out of you! You find it very strange and kind of uncomfortable sleeping on the cold ground instead of your soft bed but your new body make's it tolerable and more natural.You soon fall asleep thinking "What have I gotten myself into?".

The next morning the sun is shining brightly and you feel a lot better! You feel more energetic, happier and more free than you ever have before!You get surprised when you wake up and find you are still a quilava but quickly calm down, get up and yawn. It feels weird being a quilava, having to constantly walk on all four's and having pyrokinesis that could easily burn down a forest if you weren't careful! However you are slowly getting used to it and like the idea of being one of your favourite pokemon and having the ability to go on crazy fun adventures!

You wonder what your next course of action should be? Suddenly your new stomach start's rumbling and you remember you haven't eaten anything in a long time. You think It would be a very good idea to go search for food since last night really made you hungry. You decide to go searching for some food, most likely oran berry's.

However, asking some friendly locals would be helpful if they could tell you were you are and if they can help with the food and surviving situation. While there are dangerous pokemon out there, there are also kind one's who could be useful ally's or great friend's.

"So what should I do?" You think.

11521.content:
You stagger back on four paws. You have a long, slender tail of a devil, horns, and your body feels hot like a furnace. Your vision is surprisingly excellent. But it's dark in the room, so you wonder why you can see so well.

Looking around you, you notice that you are surrounded by a series of metal bars. One part of them seems to be old and rusty, nothing you can't handle. You feel like you can burn it to ashes.

An easy enough escape. But you still can't help but wonder where on earth you are. Looking past the bars, you notice only a few details.

The air is cold in this room, and there are several tables topped with veils and other mechanisms. Your guessing your in some sort of lab.
11521.title: Trapped...sort of

115211.content:
You tilt your head sideways and extend your jaw at the rusty bar. As you Crunch down on it, a barrage of brutal flames escape from your throat, melting all the fragments of metal that broke off when you bit the bar.

Now out of the cage, a red light is flashing and a sound is being given off, alongside a mono-toned voice. "Specimen HD 002 Security Breech. Escape Rate: 62%. Recapture and Restrain.

You dash through the dark room, panting from exaustion. The air around you is warm and thick.

Suddenly, you're blasted by a flood of water. After getting to your feet, you realized how much pain you were in. There was barely any preasure behind the attack, but it burned like fire.

You see a small hole in the corner, hidden behind some crates. It's big enough to escape, but you have no idea what it leads to.

Meanwhile, the Golduck who attacked you has clinched to your back.
115211.title: Pitch Black Attack

choices: Take the door on the left
Take the door on the right
1152111.content:
You decide to attack Golduck. You roll over onto your back, hold Golduck down with your paw, and then flip back over. You are now on top of Golduck. You give it a second to try and squirm away, but it doesn't. You toast Golduck with a blast of fire to the head, which leaves it unconscious long enough for you to escape.
You run for about ten minutes, wondering how much weight you've lost from running so fast. You come to a hallway with two doors.
Do you...
1152111.title: Attack Golduck

1152112.content:
The Golduck will have to wait, there is no time to rid of it. Who knows how many more they can summon to capture you.

In desperation, you push the crates aside for room and crawl into the small tunnel. It's a tight fit, but the Golduck is too big and can't follow you in, and is swept off upon entering.

To your dismay, you hear an enraged cry from behind you, and you could well enough guess what would happen next. As if on que, a torrent of water comes from behind and pushes you unmercifully down the rest of the tunnel.

You pray as you see a dim light up ahead. The grip on your body loosens and you prepare yourself for the next thing.

You drop from the tunnel that is connected to the ceiling in this room, and the water pours out over your body. It stung like acid and made you fall once again to the cold floor.

Once it stops pouring, you left in a big puddle of water. You lift your head up and look at your new surroundings. It seemed to be a cellar, with water pipes surrounding the walls and generators all over. Steam escaped in a manifold of places and temperature gauges shifted like mad.

Weakened by the recent events with the Golduck, you attempt to stand. You have to get out of here, one way or another.
1152112.title: No turning back

11521121.content:
No way can you stop here. Several weird things have happened so far, and you had a bad feeling about this place as well.

Struggling to bring yourself to your feet, you drag yourself out of the puddle. The hot air coming from out of the furnace feels good on your skin. After a minute standing there drying, you can stand up and walk, as if you absorbed strength from the heat.

Thanks to your great 'night-vision', you soon find a chain link spiral staircase. This is probably your only exit...
11521121.title: Heat healing

115211211.content:
You decide to enter up the stairs. The sound of your claws scraping at the metal echoed up the walls. You can smell cold air, no, freezing air above. You hear men yelling in the distance. Something about 'being stuck'.

Moments later, you reach the top and are met with a cold rush of wind. Not only do you realize where you are, but you notice why it was so freezing.

You seem to be on a ship. Somewhere near the back. You gaze out into the misty ocean, thinking that you're probably stuck here. You are a fire type, after all. Then again, under closer inspection, you seem to be surrounded by ice. Thick tundras, glaciers and such.

You trot to the edge of the ship. Looking down, you get an idea. If the ice was thick enough, perhaps you could escape.

If you do happen to escape, though, pray that you find civilization somewhere out there. Not to far off, you see a mass of land covered in thick snow. But for now, your surrounded by glaciers, and they are close enough together to walk on.
115211211.title: Frosty situation

1152112111.content:
Hoping for the best, you leap from the deck and fall a good twenty feet. You meet the ice with a hard thump. You get on your paws though, because the cause of your fear can be described in one sound; 'crack'.

Impulsively you leap to the next glacier, not causing a split in the ice. Better be careful. You look back at the previous mound of ice you fell onto, or, what was left of it. A chill crept down your spine. Just one more second and you could have been a poke'popsicle

The ice is extremely slippery and it's hard to keep your balance, especially since your paws are melting it a little on the surface. Struggling to keep your weight under control, another problem arises in, yet again, one sound; "You!"

You look up to be met with the Golduck from before. Apparently it found a way to the deck and spotted you from above. It's just not your day.
1152112111.title: It takes just one slip

11521121111.content:
In such a place and time, your best option now, for survival, is to run. This is seriously no place for a battle.

Slipping on the ice a little, you stumble from ice platform to ice platform or maybe even a glacier. As you pass the front of the ship, you can hear men yelling at you,

"Hey! It's getting away!"
"Golduck! Get it back here!"
And a manifold of other pleads and curses. But in your favor, the Golduck was nowhere to be seen and you were getting the hang of all this ice-jumping.

Minutes later, you made it to the island. It was capped in snow and ice. Hills with sharp, frozen rocks gutting out of it loomed ominously at the side.

It looked deserted, at first glance.

The island was quite large. In fact, it appeared so large you were probably just on one side of a country. Maybe it wasn't all ice.

To your left you spot a frozen lake, or rather, a gorge with a frozen river at the bottom. Ahead is a icy slope, but at the bottom rests a cave.
11521121111.title: The island of ice

choices: Ignore them and continue down the river
115211211111.content:
You jump down onto the snow in the gorge. Before you lies a long trail of frozen river, clear ice and all. You walk onto the ice, and steam rises from your paw, but nothing more. Under the ice, you can see an assortment of water pokemon, like Relicanth and Clampearl. It was pretty cool.

Looking ahead you notice two two Spheal playing on the ice, rolling around on their fat little bellies.
115211211111.title: Exploring the river

1152112111111.content:
You decide to find out what they're doing. You walk carefully across the ice, taking care that you not step in the weaker areas. As you approach, the Spheal notice you and sit there, still, staring at you. Your presence seems to discomfort them.

"Hi." You say. This does not help your position as the Spheal both cry out and start rolling away. "Wait!" You bark. You would have run after them, but a shadow is cast over you, causing you to flinch. You turn to see who it is...
1152112111111.title: You're frightening

11521121111111.content: there pissed off mother comes out and asks what are you doing? and you respectivily say that you meant no harm they just over reacted as you are new and only want some company or shelter. she then goes okay well i....
11521121111111.title: The Spheal's mother!

choices: A lone Xatu sitting calmly beside it
A group of Pokemon crowding around it
1152112111112.content:
As you continue down the gorge, the weather- which was snowing heavliy before- takes a turn for the worst. Blizzard conditions sweep in from all directions, battering you with wave after wave of icy cold wisps. As a Fire type, however, this is barely a cool breeze to you, and you continue along the river; which is now almost ten feet of solid ice underneath you.

What must be a few hours later, any internal heat that may have been helping you survive had died out. The cold seeps in like water into a sponge, stiffening your joints and stealing every ounce of strength left. Howling barrages of snow sting every part of your body, and ypu can barely see past your canine jaw. Eventually, the cold and exhaustion simply become too much- your legs give way, and on the verge of unconciousness, you see a strange shape- a Pokemon?- flying around in the distance. Then everything goes black.

You wake up in a cave, and see a fire on the edge of your vision. Turning your head to see, you notice...
1152112111112.title: Venturing on

choices: Leave in case they are unfriendly
115211211112.content:
You enter the cave and your night-vision helps you get a better perception of it. The cave walls were smooth, as if frozen but you could still feel the tiny holes in the rock. Ice in the shape of spikes hung frozen on the ceiling, which it shared with thousands and millions of beautiful diamonds. If only there were light in here, this cave would have been a natural disco ball.

Minutes later you start to hear chattering coming from deeper in the cave.
115211211112.title: Frostbitten cave

1152112111121.content:
You hesitate for a moment, but press on, careful not to make much noise. The voices become somewhat louder, and you listen to them.

"Don't worry. The chosen shall come. You will know it. It won't stay as cold for long" said a female voice.
"M-mommy...I'm hungry!" said a smaller voice.
"Don't worry, Father will be back with food soon. Hang in there" said the female again.

You couldn't help but wonder, what did they mean "the chosen"? Certainly they were nutters. You allow yourself to go a little bit farther, just so your eyes can look around the corner.

A Nidoqueen and Nidorina were huddled up together in a corner of the space. They must have been cold. But what were they doing all the way out here in the snow?

Suddenly a loud booming noise interrupted your thoughts, followed by a low grunt. "I'll give you three seconds you get your Houndoom-hiney out of here before I turn it into our dinner for the next month, and that doesn't sound like such a bad idea!" you look behind you to be met eye to eye with a gigantic Nidoking. It's dark purple hide looked like ivy from all the ice outside.
1152112111121.title: Confrontation

11521121111211.content:
"Please, I'm very cold from outside and I have just escaped being turned into a freezepop by a Golduck and a group of humans!" you plead "I mean no harm to you or your family". You were hoping to be right about the family part.

The Nidoking stared you down, breathing heavily. You were hoping he was thinking hard because you had already passed the three second time.

"Please, let him stay a while. He may be the one we're looking for" suggests the Nidoqueen. The Nidorina shivers. You look up to the Nidoking expectantly.

He snorts "Fine but for one night at the most" he shuffles past you to join his family. "Please come in" the Nidoqueen invites, gesturing towards the other corner of the cramped space.

"Mommy, he's warm!" the Nidorina chimes.

"Please tell me, Houndoom, do you know what is going on here?" the Nidoqueen asks you.
11521121111211.title: Warm but cold welcome

115211211112111.content:
The Nidoqueen smiles "That is fine, I will explain to you now..."

The Nidoqueen re-positions herself into a more comfortable spot.

"It has not been very long, to tell you the truth. This land, well, it used to be a vast paradise by the sea. Beautiful. Hot springs, cold springs, spring springs--anything you could want. Nobody wanted to leave. It was definitely a dream land.

But then, the humans came. At first, we had no idea what they wanted. They didn't want the pretty rocks from our home, nor did they want the land. Yet they came in the dozens. But soon, we learned of their selfish plan.

While nobody was around to watch, the humans snuck into the Forbidden Grotto and stole something very important to our king. They stole the blue orb, and our king was angered by this. Kyorge cast a spell over the humans, banishing their bodies into a cold winter state. However, the spell didn't turn out as planned, and now our entire island has been cast into an eternal winter" the Nidoqueen finished with a sigh.

"The only way to break the spell is to locate the blue orb and return it to Kyorge so the spell can be reversed. But our only problem is, it has been trapped under a river of ice. Nobody can break it, we have all been weakened by the onslaught of cold" the Nidoking said "and we were hoping to see a fire pokemon such as yourself one day".
115211211112111.title: Eternal Winter

11521121112.content:
You turn tail to the Golduck and leap to the nearest flat mass of ice. Best for fighting. The Golduck finds the battle field much more suitable.

As you wait for the Golduck to meet you, you quickly glance around at your settings once more.

First point, you're situated a layer of ice that can melt under your warm paws and break under any extra weight.

Second point, you're surrounded by water. Not only can you not swim, but you're a fire type as well and the water is cold so it could probably freeze you if you are in there too long.

Third point, your facing up to a pokemon that is a water type, can swim, and is seemingly immune to the cold atmosphere.

...
You figure that you're fate is obvious.
The Golduck reaches the platform of ice where you wait, beckoning toward you. You clench your teeth in a growl, thinking of your first move.
11521121112.title: A sadistic foe

115211211121.content: The Golduck makes a sound of disapproval as your body slowly becomes invisible. Seizing your opportunity, you start to run with as much stealth as you can toward Golduck. "Fool!" it shouts. The Golduck must have seen your paw prints, because it lunges forward a mega punch straight at your head!
115211211121.title: Failed stealth

choices: Attack the people in the stands
11521122.content:
You're in too much pain from whatever just happened. You lay down, and tuck your snout in between your legs to take a nap.

Soon as you feel energized, you jump to life and blast a flamethrower out to protect yourself, but it's too late. When you were asleep, they caught you and put you back in a cage. It took you the whole time to react to it.

"Grrrrrr...." You mumble to yourself, wondering what's going on. "Why am I a pokemon? Where am I?"

Suddenly, someone shoves a needly in your neck, and you're out cold again. This time you wake up feeling extra powerful, as if they injected you with something to make you stronger.

You're in a colliseum style ring, but it's dark, smaller, and in some sort of a cave.

"URRRAAAARR!!!" Shouts a bear like pokemon from in front of you, looking particularly angry.

You can hear random people yelling from the stands.
"Kill it, Houndoom!"
"Let that Ursaring eat it! I'll win my bet that way!"
"Five-hundred says they're both dead at the end!"

You've been forced into some sort of pokemon Cock Fight!
11521122.title: Cock Fighter: Red Version

115211221.content:
If you win enough matches, you'll be let out of here. Or atleast you'll live to find out why you're a pokemon.

You charge up as fast as you can, and tilt duck your head as you slam into it, knocking it back several feet. You waste no time in dashing up on top of the Ursaring, lying on it's back, and igniting a flamethrower in it's face.

It's aparent it's not getting up. Your skin suddenly crawls, and apears to have a will of it's own. Your body wants you to finish it off... for good. You need to kill the Ursaring.

"Kill it! You've won!" Men roar from the stands.

"No! It's not right, it's already been defeated." you tell yourself.
115211221.title: Finish it or you're nothing

1152112211.content:
It doesn't look like you are going to be let out of this area any time soon unless you finish it. The Usaring was down, and this may be your only chance. You don't want to, but it looks like your only option.

Closing your eyes, you lunge forward and crunch down on the giant's neck. This fur ball, about five times your size, was now at your mercy. "Sorry.." you think. Without warning, you sink your devilish fangs into the flesh and turn your head violently to the side.

You hear a loud 'crack!' and release your grip on the Usaring's jugular. The taste of the warm crimson liquid on your fangs only reminded you of the deed you just performed.

Cheers erupted and drowned out the few 'boos' from the people who lost their bet.

"I knew you could do it!"
"Houndoom!"
"That's a good pokemon!"
"There goes a good five-hundred...!"

Several such cheers could be heard in the sea of sounds. But you only sit in guilt. Maybe you shouldn't have. Then again, you feel pity for the Ursaring. Giving it deeper thought, that could have been you. Just thinking of it gave you the chills.

And yet, you felt angry at the same time. It just wasn't fair to have to be forced to fight like that. Forced to kill. It wasn't right. You knew it.

Minutes later, three men entered the arena with what looked like tzars and needles.
1152112211.title: Gravel stained red

11521122112.content:
You just stood where you were, and the men dropped another cage in front of you. "Oh great..." you mutter as a chain is yanked, and the cage falls apart revealing a rock.

You slowly aproach it, sniffing it. Your instincts tell you that something's wrong. Why would they cage up a rock?

You trip over your legs in shock as two arms, legs and a head pop out of the rock. It wasn't a rock at all, it was a Golem!

Golem retracts it's limbs again, and steadilly rolls at you in ball form, straight at you.

You open your mouth, and a stream of fire is thrown off at the Golem, to no avail. I hits you, hard, and knocks you to the ground, rolling over you in the proccess.

It keeps rolling, and doubles back.
11521122112.title: Rocky Start

115211221122.content:
"Beat it, you worthless mutt!"
"If you lose, I'll kill you myself!"
"MUA HA! That Dog is going to run away!"

The taunts of the crowd get to you again, and you hold your ground as the Golem rolls straight at you. Thinking quick, you get your head as low as you can.

Moments later, the Golem rolls ot you, and just as it touches the horns on your head, you jolt it upward, hurling it several feet backwards, knocking out a wall.

"DIE!!!" Comes a scream from behind you. At first you thought it was the crowd, but then the ground started to shake rapidly, the source of the Earthquake being the Golem.

In addition to the Earthquake, the Golem had started to throw rubble at you.
115211221122.title: Land Breaker

1152112211221.content:
Realizing just how beat up the arena was, you could probably just run out of it, and avoid killing any more pokemon.

As you turn tail, your paws burning as you run, the wind glides quickly over your body, making you feel even faster.

Right as you get to the broken wall, the Earthquake picks up again, knocking the rest of the wall on top of you.

You lay pinned on the ground, as the Golem starts to beat on you, using all it's energy. Your blood is splattered everywhere.

Suddenly, you hear a siren and see flashing lights. The police! The men flee, and the Golem seems to completely change personality, and rejoice along side you.

At least a dozen officers were roaming the underground arena. Some men were taken away in handcuffs, other had escaped one way or another. Pokemon in cages were placed in a truck and sent away for examination. You pass out in relief.

When you wake up, you're in another white room, lights beating hard down on you. "This Houndoom has been injected with pure super concentrated adrenalin syrum. It's no wonder it was so hostile." say the men examining you.

After that, you were hooked up to an IV for a few days, to pump it out of you, and then placed in a cage, on a truck, to send you somewhere. You were feeling a little better now, but you were still a Houndoom, and had no idea where you were being taken.

Your first memory as a Houndoom is refreshed, as you spy the corner bars on your cage, gathering a little rust...
1152112211221.title: Shut Down

11521122112212.content:
Denying the easy escape that could have gotten you away, you decide that these people want to help you. They're friendly.

"Get out while you can." says a familiar voice from behind you.

"Golem?" you say, looking around.

"Up here." Golem was in the cage above yours. "Get out while you can. I know where they're taking us."

"Where?" You ask curiously. What could be so bad about it?

"The Hostile Pokemon ReEducating Detention Camp." It says, gulping nervously after every word.

"ReEducating?!?" You bark out, causing the other pokemon to panic. "I can't be reeducated! I'm human!"

The Golem grins. "I know. You have to get out now!"

No sooner than he ordered you, the bars were burned to ash, and you slammed the back door of the truck open with your head.
11521122112212.title: Reeducating Camp?!?

115211221122122.content:
"Sorry, there's no time!" You say as you jump down to the rock hard pavement, scratching your nails against the hard, black tar.

You could see the Golem laughing with glee on the truck. You looked to the truck's destination, over the hill.

A Beach, and resort. It wasn't a detention camp, it was some sort of pokemon resort...

The sky was dark, and the moon was bright. You could see a small cluster of buildings back a while, but you might be able to get back on the truck if you hurrt.
115211221122122.title: Trucking Con

You...

choices: You are in the girl's house
115212.content:
If you try to escape, somebody is bound to notice. Instead, you kneel down on your haunches and wait. If you cooperate, information will come easier.

Eventually, light flooded into the room and you must have fell asleep because you felt all groggy. A man with black hair entered the room. The man looked slightly into his twenties. He wore a pale green shirt, shorts, and his hair was held into wings by a red band on his forehead. The man seemed friendly enough.

He reached into the cage and pulled you out gently and put a collar with a leash on you. It was certainly not the most comfortable thing you ever wore.

You were walked out of the room and into the light, and, to your surprise, it was a normal looking room. Nothing creepy about it except it looked like a big doctor's office. You were walked down a long hall and past shelves adorned with pokeballs.

Eventually, you reached a room with a couple more people in it; and old man wearing a white doctor coat, and a teenage girl with long blond hair tied into a ponytail.

"I found this fella wandering around in the woods out back and thought that he'd be the perfect pokemon for you to start with!" said the old man.

"Thank you so much Prof. Oak!" the girl said with a smile on her face. She walked up to you and bent down and started to pet you. "We're going to go on a little adventure together, how does that sound?" she said pulling out a pokeball.

Next thing you know, you are engulfed in a red light and transferred into a black surrounding. You can't see a thing but it's as if you know what's going on in the outside world.
115212.title: You are given away

11522.content: Do you have four legs and a helmet? Maybe you're a Heatran.
11522.title: Legendary flames

115221.content: "Ugh...I shouldn't have ate that last cookie last night..." You groaned, awaking with a headache. "Where am I?" You wonder, looking at the walls of a cave. "I'm sure it's around here somewhere!" A voice said, tinged with age and annoyance. "I want to see Heatran!" A younger, more feminine voice said. Heatran? You've envied that awesome legendary when you first encountered it. You started to notice you were on four legs, legs similar to Heatran's. You decide you've turned into Heatran, still slightly not believing it, and settled down for a nap. You guess you were sleeping for an hour before the voices found you. "Heatran, awaken!" The aged voice called out, but you felt too cold to wake up. "Err, the stone Professor Rowan?" The younger voice said. "Right Dawn!" The aged voice, which you decided was Professor Rowan, exclaimed. You felt warmer, and you awoke, seeing Professor Rowan and Dawn.

1152211.content: Professor Rowan tried to get close to take a look, but you backed away. "Dawn, my briefcase." Rowan said in a bit of an urgent tone, as if you were going to disappear. Dawn handed him his briefcase, and he pulled out a master ball. He threw it, and before you knew it you were sucked in, and you blacked out. You woke up in a volcano-like environment, and you saw a forest beyond your environment. Behind you, you see a factory.

1152221.content:
Upon peering just a bit closer to the water, your vision finally loses its fuzziness and you realize that you're staring at a Flareon in the water. And what's worse, you can tell that that Flareon is you! Panicked, you scramble back from the small pond...well, more like tumbled, considering your unfamiliarity with walking on four feet. "What happened to me!?" you cry out, using your paws to check your face. Using your teeth, you pinch your wrist, hoping that everything is just a dream...but nothing happens other than a pained wrist.

"What's going on...?" you groan, just as a scent hits your nose. You don't recognize it at all, but you are helpless against it. Sniffing, you get up to follow the smell, wobbling on your feet. After wiggling a bit through the bushes, you come upon...

You've always liked the taste of the gooey junk food. And since your a Flareon, you can roast it as you please! You stepped around the trainer to get to the marshmallows. You helped yourself to the gooey taste, unknowing that the trainer is waking up. "Flareon!" The trainer exclaimed, causing you to tumble backwards. "Lucky you, you're just in time! Come along, friend, it's about to start, and aren't we lucky this year! No humans around!" When you saw one of the Jolteons mount another, you immediately knew what was going on. It was mating season, and all the Eeveelutions around had come to find their mate. eat the Salac Berry and find someone

you run into another mating season going on a beach; that of eeveelutions, just like that one you tried to get away from. you were about to let out a "oh come on!" when you noticed something different about this one. there's a few same sex couples in the mix and none of them seem to be sticking with the same mon for long; at the last one they seemed to expect you to help raise the kids with mon you were with when you're done so what's happening?

"you see the surrounding areas for whatever reason tend to have way more eeveelutions living in them then anywhere else and we've noticed that we all seem to go into rut/heat about once a month instead of once or twice a year, and over time we decided that if we're going to be do it this often we might as well all meet up at the same place to make things easier on everyone, but somewhere along the way there was this big argument between those of us that wanted to decide for ourselves when we should be having kids and how and the ones that insisted on not only that we had to make kids every time we went into rut/heat- which is fucking nuts with how often we end up going at it- but that we had to raise them together like we were humans or something..." he pauses when he sees you flinch at the word humans but he doesn't look into why you flinched for long. "anyway eventually instead of going to war over this we agreed to disagree and set up two places to meet up, one for our way of doing thing and one for theirs, and before you ask Salac Berries make sure those of us who don't want kids don't"

a natural birth control pill? you mentally ask yourself "anyway we better get a move on, I'm not sure if you've been in heat before but us eeveelutions are pretty well known among other pokemon for being tough to please since our ruts/heats are ten times worse the any other pokemon... which is probably why theses things tend to last at least a weak now that I think about it; if you don't start now you can forget about controlling yourself later" and with that he hands you a Salac Berry and walks off. to say you're shocked would be the understatement of the year, you really didn't want to have to be apart of this but if what he said is true- and you're finding it increasingly harder to find a reason he'd tell you all of that and walk off for it all to be a lie- then it looks like you don't have much of a choice here...

The Vaporeon finally off of you, you manage to catch your breath. The mating is still continuing...after three or so hours, it's obvious that the 'ceremonies' will continue until the day ends. You purr somewhat, stretching your sore body. You turn to your 'mate', who is smirking and suddenly seems very unfriendly. "Well, now that I'm pretty sure you're pregnant with my kits, I'll be going to find another willing female." You gape at him, utterly floored. "Wait, I thought this made us mates!" you said, getting angry. "I'm a roamer, chicky. I don't settle down with a female, and that's how it's going to stay." He laughed, and before you could figure out how to attack him, he was loping off, out of your view. You stare after him, not sure whether to be angry, upset, or both. You were sure you were now pregnant, but now you had to deal with that and being a Pokemon alone. Why hadn't you taken the chance to run while you still could have!?

"Flareon?" You growl and jump at the sound of another male voice, only to discover it was the Espeon that had originally shown you into the clearing. His ears droop and he sighs. "I saw what happened...those roaming males are always causing trouble and getting the younger females to bear their kits by using sweet words. I'm sorry I couldn't have helped you..." You growl, his sympathy somewhat annoying you. "So?"

He stared at you for a good while, before sighing again. "How about this...I'll become your mate. I'm not a roamer, so I won't leave as soon as I've had my way with you. I'll keep you safe and well-fed, and make sure our kits are raised right, even if some of them are his. Will you mate with me?"

115222222221112222221.content:
I heard a branch snap and quickly turned. A man dressed in shady clothing was behind me, carrying something. It looked like a long pole. Before I did anything, the man jabbed me with the pole. I felt a electrical current run through my body, and I fell over. The last thing I saw was the man smile. I opened my eyes to find myself in a cage. The man before was standing in front of me, with a controller.

"You! What did you do?!" I commanded but all that came out were growls.

"Now now, don't get testy" he said while waving that controller. "Don't do anything you'll regret."

"I won't regret this!"

I breathed in, trying to produce flames. The man pressed the button, and a electrical current flowed through me. I fell to the ground, but I didn't pass out.

"Like I said, do nothing testy. Your wearing a special collar."

I felt my neck and felt the collar. I tried to get it off, but he pressed the button. I fell again, but I managed to get up.

"Good, your learning" he said. "Now, it's time for me to work, and you to earn the money!"

He opened the door in front of me, and a bright light shined through. He moved my cage out into the light. A busy city park street was in front of a stand. He placed my cage beside the stand, and changed his clothes.

"Fine quality Pokemon here only!" he said. "Don't be shy or scared, this one is really powerful!"

I laid down trying to ignore his rambling. He was constantly trying to make deals with everyone, but no one fitted his price. Just then, a shadow loomed over me. I looked up and saw...
115222222221112222221.title: Caged and Captured!

1152222222211122222211.content:
There were two girls standing in front of my cage. One was a teenager, the other was a little girl. The little girl had blonde hair put into pigtails, wore a pink skirt and black shoes. The teenager had long white hair that nearly touched the ground. She wore a light blue tank-top and Jean shorts. Her eyes were a mystical blue. She seemed very beautiful. The little girl giggled and talked to the man.

"Hey mister, can I have him?" she asked.

"Sorry kiddie, I won't except piggy bank money" the man replied.

"Lily! Eve! Time to go!" said a voice.

The little girl ran off, but the teenager stayed.

"Eve!" said the same voice.

"I'll be there in a minute mom!" Eve yelled back. She approached the man, "How much is this Typhlosion?"

"This is a rare Pokemon Missy" said the man, "I can't just..."

"I'll give you 500 for him."

"Sold!"

He grabbed the money greedily and then grabbed that pole. He opened my cage, and I sat up. I walked out, but the man grabbed me by my collar.

"Yhis collar will prevent him from attacking, as long as you press this button" he said.

"I understand" replied Eve.

She grabbed the controller and me by the collar. Eve dragged me to...
1152222222211122222211.title: Eve and Lily

11522222222111222222111.content:
Eve was pulling me by the collar at first, but she let go and I followed. I was feeling a surge of different emotions all at the same time. The most brilliant was happiness. After a while, we stopped by a lake and she went under a tree. I walked up to her, but she held up the remote with her thumb ready to press the button. I stepped back nervously and went to the ground, trying to look as harmless as I possibly could. Eve looked like she was getting a laugh out of my behavior, but she stopped.

"Do I have to use this?" she asked.

I shook my head rapidly, and Eve approached. I closed my eyes not wanting to see what would happen. I heard a click, and I looked down. Eve removed the collar, and threw it into the lake. I looked at her surprised, and I hugged her. I couldn't believe how much taller I was. I was about to let go, when Eve returned the hug. I let out a low purr, and she giggled.

"That reminds me of something" she said. "Are you a boy or girl?"
11522222222111222222111.title: Kindness

I hugged her tighter and she giggled.

"Alright boy settle down."

11522222222222222221.content:
You stare at the nearly glass-like reflection of the pool of water, utterly shocked by what you were seeing. Surely this was not possible? It was just a dream, right? You raise a hand to your face and see the Fennekin in the water raise a paw to its own shocked face. You look down and bark in surprise, bouncing with the force behind the noise, as you see a tiny little paw in place of your hand. You instantly whirl about, albeit in a wobbly fashion, looking yourself over. From your head to your tail, there was no doubt that you'd become the Kalos fire starter.

         "W-what the heck!?" you cry out, falling onto your rump with a soft thud after losing your balance trying to move on all fours. You cringe and look around, seeing that you were in a forest, right next to some tall grass. At least, it was certainly tall compared to your now tiny frame. Your stomach suddenly gave off an angry growl and you felt a slight twinge from your midsection. You look around awkwardly, both seeking food to silence your belly and watching to see if your outbursts had attracted attention, survival instincts starting to kick in now that your initial shock was calming down. You spot no real food, but you do see some dry twigs on the ground nearby, presumably having fallen from the large oak tree just in between the tall grass and the river.

11522222222222222221111211.content:
You wake up to the sight of the female trainer that had carried you here… “Frein?” “Hi there, feeling any better than you were earlier?” You slightly nod before lying you head down as you’re still tired. “Awe you will feel better in no time!” You simply nod. *Why is she treating me so well? I barely even know her…*

“I would like for you to be my first Pokémon? If that is ok with you.” *She wants me as her Pokémon. We barely know each other.* “Freiniken?” “Why?” You nod slightly. “Well I wanted a freiniken but they didn’t have it at the lab because I slept in.” *She slept in and missed her first Pokémon.* “I met ash and traveled with him hoping to find one when I saw you.”

*She wants me as her first Pokémon she risked herself with not having one… It probably won’t be so bad with her…* “I will let you rest I just hope you would be my first Pokémon…” She exits the room as you are thinking… *She seems very nice I doubt she will mistreat me… I will be her Pokémon but first I have to recover my strength! Lots of training is needed!*

You soon fall asleep as you were still recovering you recall Nurse Joy saying in about a day you should have healed completely. You soon wake up feeling fully healthy and healed you soon spring up and see that Serena is sitting next to your bed again asleep on the sheets. *Wow she slept next to me!* you walk over and poke her face where she looks up to see you looking at her funny with your head sideways. “Oh, you’re awake. I guess I fell asleep.” She looks down about it.

“Frein?” “What is it fieniken? You want to tell me something?” You nod you had thought about her question to join her and had decided you would! “Frein...” “Does this have anything to do with the question I asked?” You nod. “So yes or no… wait speak for no…” You reply with no speech. “Speak for yes…” “Fieniken.” “You want to be my Pokémon?” You nod. “Here tap the button and you will be mine…” You walk over and tap the button being sucked inside.

You see a tear run down her face. * Did I make her cry? Is it happy tears or sad tears?*

It's true. You now have scaley light blue skin, and a crippling shell covering your back. You just can't get comfortable with it there. It either digs into your neck, or you lean forward, which is even worse. You also have a short stub of a tail sticking out from just above your butt.

121.title: Squirtle

1211.content:
You stood still in place, looking curiously at the young girl who looked somewhat eager at something. "Magnemite, use Flash Cannon!" The girl shouted to the magnet Pokemon. The magnets on it's sides started to charge balls of electricity with it's eye narrowed.

You finally snapped out of your daydream and knew that the girl was probably going to try and catch you. You tried to think of some move that Squirtles knew and finally came up with a move. You opened your mouth and breathed out, leading to a jet of water to propel out of your mouth at the Magnemite.

The Magnemite was splattered in water, but it seemed to not be affected at all as it released it's charged energy at you. You quickly dodged to the side and used another water gun at the Magnemite.It seemed to be somewhat damaged by it this time.

The girl flashed you an irritated look and then commanded, "Magnemite, Explosion!" The Magnemite suddenly started flashing white, which confused you a bit. The Magnemite then exploded in your face, which took you by surprise. Before you knew it, you felt amazing pain and was close to blacking out.

The girl then shouted, "Pokeball, go!" as she threw a red and white sphere at you, which hit you on your forehead and sucked you in. You blacked out almost immediately. When you woke up, you were inside a sphere around the size of you. Your vision suddenly went white as you felt as if you were released from the sphere.

When your vision came back, you saw you were standing in front of the same girl who chucked that Pokeball at you. "Hi, Squirtle, my name is Kiara. I am your new trainer." The girl said cheerfully, reaching for another Pokeball. "Do you want to train, Squirtle?" Kiara asked you, eyes looking directly into yours.

You wondered whether you wanted to train with her or refuse to be her Pokemon.

It's Dark, and the walls of the sphere are closing in fast, you have to get away!

Suddenly everything locks into place, and a strange feeling of loyalty to the girl comes over you. She lets you out of the pokeball.

The Gym Leader called out a Geodude. You used Aqua Tail and the Geodude fainted. It returned and then the Gym Leader sent out a Golem. It tried to use Giga Punch, but you quickly used Water Gun. You nodded and Katie sent out another Blastoise. This Blastoise had a bow tied on her head. Katie smiled and said "Hey look Blastoise, here is a friend. Her name is Ariel." Oh, and I'm going to call you Jordan, okay?" You nodded and Katie returned you.
1212212122.title: Katie goes to the Gym Battle.

choices: Stay with Katie and the team
Leave now, with Ariel beside you
12122121222.content:
As you, Katie, and Ariel began traveling to other places, Ariel has been staring at you more and more whenever the two of you are outside at the same time.
"Well Jordan, looks like Ariel has been giving you the Eye lately."Katie tells you.
But you don't even know what "the Eye" even means. Nevertheless, you continue the journey all around the region.

         One night, while camping out in the woods, Katie called both of you out to take a rest. She immediately falls asleep in her tent, but the two of you lay awake watching the stars.
"You know Jordan, you look pretty cool when you fight."Ariel suddenly says.
"Oh, well thanks..."Jordan says.
"Um, Jordan, have you ever thought about, um..."
"About what?"
"You know, uh, finding a mate?"
"Where did that question come from!?"
"Oh, uh, never mind! It's not like I like you or anything, but who wouldn't like you, I mean..."
"Wait, are you saying you wanna be my mate?"
Ariels face immediately goes red with embarrassment.
"No! That's not what I mean! it's just ah, how do I put this..."
"Do you like me?"
Ariel instantly went completely silent at his words. It was a minute before she spoke a soft "Yes."
"...Gee, I never thought you would actually like me..."
"Well, it's just...When I watch you battle, I thought you were really strong. So I just started feeling..."
"I'm really sorry, but honestly, don't get me the wrong way but, I don't really feel the same toward you..."
Ariel and Jordan stared at each other for a while. It was only after tears began to build up in Ariel's eyes before she began to speak.
"So...You don't like me?"she said, a slight sob evident in her voice.
"No, no, of course I like you, I just don't like you like how you like me."Jordan said, holding her shoulder.
"B-but, why? Am I ugly? Or am I too weak?"
"No, you're beautiful. And you're also very powerful too. It's just...I have this secret."
"What secret? Can you please tell me?"
"Well, can you keep it? From everyone else? Including Katie?"
She gave a slight nod before Jordan whispered something into Ariel's ear.
"I...I think I used to be a human."
"...What? What do you mean? You're a pokemon, aren't you?"
"I know, but I have this really strange memory. All I know is before I first met Katie, I remember being a human before. After that, I was a squirtle."
"So, is that why you don't lo- ah! I mean, like me?"
"Yeah...I guess so. I need to find out what's up with this memory of mine, but I don't wanna abandon Katie and everything she did for me."
"...How about you think it over before you make a decision."
"Yeah. Let's get some rest. It's getting late."

         The next morning, all three of you wake up and begin to pack your camping things. Katie grabs your ball from her belt and faces you.
"Alright Jordan, it's time to go back in now."
You give her a sad look, hoping she would understand what you mean.
"What's wrong, is something the matter?"
You point towards the forest. Katie glances at Ariel, who also has a sad look on her face.
"Do you...wanna leave the team?"
You give a nod, and look at Katie's face. She gives a warm smile,but tears start to fill her eyes.
"...Jordan...You've been so helpful to me for all this time...But you wanna face the world on your own now, don't you? Don't worry, I don't blame you. You must be tired of all this fighting, right? Well, I won't force you to stay, but you can leave now, if you really want to."
You give Ariel a glance, who gives you a smile as well.
12122121222.title: Loved, but no love

121222.content:
"Squirt! Squirt! Squirt!!!" You force out at her. You make it really clear you don't want to help.

"Aw, well sorry guy. I don't want to force you to do it if you don't want to. Come here." She takes out a pink pokedex, and presses a small black button. Suddenly your pokeball begins to glow and she calls you back into it. "See ya later Squirtle!"


When you finally get out, you are let out in a Pokemon Lab. The profesor there feeds you, and lets you play with all the other pokemon in the Garden during the day. It's not much of a life, but it sure is peaceful. Once in a while, the trainer takes you and teaches you some attacks, but you're never strong enough to actually fight.

You slowly begin to forget what it was to be human...

Maybe it's for the best...
121222.title: Days Of Peace

choices: Try and go up to Shore
122.content:
You're already in the water, and sticking out of it. As you stare at the serpent beauty of yourself, now a Gyarados, you begin to wonder how this happened.

You just admire your long segmented blue body, huge mouth, and sharp teeth. You get a little upset because you can't use arms or legs, but you manage your temper. You look around and check out the city. You're in a bay with ships around.

"Well, atleast I'm in an ocean, not a pond." You relieve, but something caught between words, and roars comes out.
122.title: Gyarados

1221.content:
You dive underwater and there is a whole new world underneith the surface. Magikarp, Goldeen, Seeking, and many other water type pokemon swim peacefully around the harbour's shapes of boats, ledges, and walls.

You rush over to join them as you see a Seeking and Goldeen playing hide and go seek behind a boat. But they swim away at the site of your face. A raging Gyrados.

Now the title fits you. You are so mad that you are not accepted for sterotypes about your breed, that you cause a rampage through the harbour. Bitting holes in the bottom of the boats, or creating whirpools to suck them under. Attacking buildings on the shore wite feirce and powerful attacks. You are so Mad!

Then you here a scream. You turn around and see on the ledge three humans in yellow jumpsuit like outfits. Each has an electric Pokemon. A Pikachu, A Magentron, and an Amphrous.

"Raging Pokemon! We the Pokemon Justice Squad!" They did a little dance at these words. You let out a sigh "Will not let you damage this harbour anymore than you already have. Either leave calmly or we shall take you down by force!"

He raised his fist as to threathon you.

What do you do?
1221.title: Rampaging about

12211.content:
The voltage those pokemon were packing was more than enough to kill you, no way were you fighting that. You dive underwater and swim out in the direction of the ocean until you are sure it's safe.

After about a day as a Gyarados, you're stomache , starts cramping. You're hungry. You patrol the area in a desperate attempt for food, trying to find something edible, and then it hits you.

You swim near a coral reef and find exactly what you wanted. Hundreds of water pokemon, fit for an ambush, and some fishermen on a boat above, just as unsuspecting.
