1411211.content:
Next morning, you wake up, on the same bed you went to sleep on the night before. "Bugger", you think,"This is real. Well, I'd better go find Ezzy if I'm evolving soon".

Just then, an earth moving snore fills the room, and you spin around to try and locate the source. It's Umbra, he's still asleep."That's odd", a voice in your head says, and you take a long sniff at the air. You can smell food."Why's he asleep if breakfast's ready. And you walk away, trying to find your first pokemon meal. What you didn't know, is that Umbra isn't asleep. He's just pretending...

You find it somewhat harder to move as you find your food, but you shrug it off, thinking it's because you haven't got used to quadrupedal movement yet. After about five or ten minutes, you reach your breakfast. The others are there, chowing down into expensive silver dishes. As you get closer, Ezzy appears to finnish, and sees you as she turns around.

"There you are Eevee", she says cheerily,"come, we need to get....rea...dy.......soon" she says as you two get closer together. Mist, noticing Ezzy's rate of speech, looks over at you.
"Brother, what hapened to you?", she asks, incredulous.
"What do you mean?",you reply.
"Look in the mirror", she said, pointing past Ezzy, who had not moved since looking at you. as you move around the frozen Espeon, you see what they were talking about. Your belly nearly touches the ground, your legs are covered with fat. Your face and back have plumped up as well. You even have a second chin.

They are all staring as you turn around to face them, even Flareon and Jolteon.
"How did you get that fat", they ask in unison.
"I don't know", you answer."There is no reason I should have got this fat, no reason at all"
"Oh I wouldn't say that", says an eerie voice behind you. Umbra, is standing in the doorway, an evil grin on his face.
"Hello Eevee, I was like you once, young, carefree and innocent. I believed that Pokemon shouldn't be given too much to worry about. That was until I evolved into what I am now. I believe Mist and Ezzy were there at the time, weren't you both".
"Yes we were", says Mist,"and you haven't stopped moaning since!"
"That's because you just sit on your arses all day, while I do all the work, what are you, pets?".
"Yes Umbra", says Flareon,"and you are too".
"SHUT IT", he shouts back, you can tell, he's bottled this up for a long time."I'm better than you, all of you, even our master, so I turned you into the fat lazy buggers you are".
"But why start with me...", you begin, but he cuts accross you.
"THAT IS IRRELAVENT!, pokemon could overthrow the humans, if it wasn't for lazy, overpampered wastes of space like you lot.

Suddenly...

"You, little f...", shouted Jolteon, charging at Umbra, until he stopped, and floated into the air, still trying to run at Umbra.
"Tut tut Sparks. Always the little hot head. But I can sort that out".
"Umbra, what are you doing? Umbra,Umbraaaaaa", said Sparks, as he flew accross the room into a glass case, which shattered instantly. Shards of glass rained down, and his yellow fur was streaked with red.

"SPARKS", shouted Ezzy, Mist and Flareon, and they along with you rushed over to help and comfort the striken pokemon.
"Sparks, are you all right, you're bleeding all over", said Ezzy, panicing, as Flareon swept the glass away with his tail, and Mist used her water gun to clean the wounds, shooting contemptuous glances at Umbra.

"I know", he replied."There may be glass in my leg, but I'm still going to get him", looking straight at Umbra.
"I knew it would come to this", sais Umbra, closing his eyes.

All of a sudden, Mist found it harder to clean Sparks' cuts, they were moving away from here.
"Sparks", she said"stop moving, you'll hurt yourself again".
"I'm not", he said.
"Umbra's made him fat like me", you said, realising there was much more yellow fur infront of you than a minute ago. He had gained in the same proportions as you, but his neck was also packed with fat, so he couldn't see his change without a mirror.

"Sorry, I didn't want him attacking me again", said Umbra, grinning.
"You.....bas",began Sparks, but Umbra cut accross him
"Now now Sparks, you could have a coronary if you overstrain yourself now"

Ezzy walked over, and whispered on your ear"Eevee, you've got to get help, Umbra's out of control"
"In a minute", you replied,"I have a question for my brother"
"You said you used to be like me Umbra, what made you change", you ask him.
"Yes, you were always so calm and kind, so what brought this on", said Flareon.
"I was, Smoky, until the night our parents were taken from us!", he said indignantly.
"You mean the car crash?, we all know", said Flareon.
"THAT IS A LIE", he bellowed back" our parents were trying to get us away from here. They just wanted to be normal. They found a hiding place and were about to bring us, when Master returned with a gun, and killed them. I'm sick of being the only one who knows"

14112111.title: The Stand Off

141121112.content:
"Then why didn't you ever tell anybody?" You ask, watching as Sparks picked the glass warily out of his chubby legs.
Umbra snorted. "Because nobody would listen. I was the one who did all the training and hard work. But for what? Power, of course." He sounded insane.
"And now the only thing left in my way is getting rid of the roadblocks. That is to say, all of you." Umbra faces you. "It's too bad you decided to be a lazy pokemon. You could have joined my cause."

Smoky gasped. "Your cause?"

Umbra laughed. "Did I not just inform you? Overthrow the humans!"

"But you only make one. Nobody would help you." Mist pointed out.

"Silly girl - there are many who would love to rule this world." Ezzy looked away from him. "Brother, how could you?" She said. But Umbra did not reply.
"I'll be starting now. My regards to the Master." He turned tail to leave.

1411212.title: the accidental 2nd sister espeon

14112121.content:
It had been a week since your brother had accidentally turned you into a pink girl espeon, and in that time your sister had coached you through the many odds and ends of being a girl: how to behave, how to control your new female hormones, and even when to know when you are in heat. Through all of this training you had become a girl mentally as well as physically. You found yourself giggling all the time and your previous love for battling and running around the forest had been replaced by the more feminine qualities of gossiping and making yourself look pretty. Your sister was overjoyed that there was another girl in the family and constantly chatted with you about girl stuff, something she had never been able to do when she had been the only female in the family.

Your brother umbreon however had been noticeably absent since you had transformed, as he still felt guilty for turning you into a girl. He had only returned to you and your sister once in the past week, coming back to give you a pink bow he had found in the forest, which you have worn ever since then because you think it makes you look cute.

"Sister I'm worried about umbreon, he's been gone for days now and I'm afraid he still guilty about turning me female." you tell your sister during one of your many chat sessions.

"Don't worry little sis, I'm sure he's fine." your sister tells you, nuzzling you and giving you a playful lick on the cheek in an attempt to comfort you.

"I know sister but I just don't get why he'd still be guilty, I mean I already told him I forgave him." you tell her.

"I don't know Rose; guys are weird like that sometimes. Which reminds me..." your sister says, covering her mouth with her paw to contain her giggles. She then stares you in the eye and tells you “Rose, you've made me so proud this past week watching you transform into a girl in mind as well as body, now I have my own little sister to talk about girl stuff with! But you see sis, there's still one more thing I have to teach you about..."

"And what is that?" you ask innocently.

Your sister giggles and replies "Boys..."
14112121.title: Adapting

141121211.content:
"Boys?" you ask, fear bleeding into your voice, "But sis I already know everything about boys, after all I was one!"

“That’s exactly it Rose” your sister replies “You know everything from a guy's perspective. But a couple of things have changed now that you’re a girl.”

“Like what?” you ask, not quite getting what she means.

“Like dating for example. You see sis, since you’re a girl now, you’re going to want to make sure that your boyfriend is…”

You obediently sit through the lesson, committing every word to memory, because even though a part of you feels a bit wrong about the thought of being in a relationship with a boy, you know it’s going to happen eventually.

“…and that pretty much sums up how to let a boy know you like him. Any questions?”

“No sis…” you reply, a bit overwhelmed from all this new information. A blush breaks out on your cheek when you imagine dating another boy, snuggling against him in his protective paws, kissing him softly on the lips…”

“Hello, earth to Rose?” you sister giggles, breaking you from your daydream.

“Oh, sorry sis! I was just—“

“thinking about what it’s like to have a boyfriend, weren’t you sis?” she replies with a smirk.

“What, what makes you think that? I wasn’t thinking about kissing a boy!” you stutter.

“Well first of all I never said anything about kissing a boy” she says, causing you to mentally kick yourself for having a Freudian slip “secondly you have that look in your eye that all girls get when they’re thinking about a boy, and lastly your currently blushing so hard that your face looks like a tomato.”

“Well, maybe I was thinking about it a little bit…” you mumble, knowing you’ve been caught red-handed.

“Well I’m glad you’re thinking that way because I’ve already signed you up for a little double-date with me, my boyfriend and his little brother!” she squeals in delight, making it obvious that she’d been planning this for awhile.

You, on the other hand, are not so overjoyed with this news, and the color drains from your face as you scream “A date already!? But sis I’ve only been a girl for little more than a week now, I’m not ready to go out with guys yet!!”

“Come on Rose, didn’t you say a week ago that you’ll eventually have to find a mate?” you sister asks.

“Yes sis, eventually, not in just a week!”

“Oh don’t get your bow in a twist Rose. I’m not saying you have to mate with the guy, I just think it’s time you got a little snuggle-buddy of your own. Now let me grab some perfume and combs and we can help each other get ready…” she says before you quickly run off into the woods as fast as you can, leaving a trail of dust in your wake.

"Looks like someone has cold feet." your sister giggles as she starts to groom herself for the date. "You're going to have to come out of your shell eventually Rose!"

You sprint through the trees as fast as your legs can take you, checking over your shoulder every few seconds to make sure your sister isn’t following you. Suddenly you see a furry blur running towards you out of the corner of your eye and you quickly brace yourself right before it runs into you head-on.

“Ugh…” you groan, your head dizzy as you try to get up onto your paws “What happened?”

“Oh my god I’m so sorry!” you hear a male voice call out above you “I was running away from my brother and I didn’t see you! Let me help you up!”

You try to focus on the furry blob helping you to your paws but you eyesight is blurred from the collision.

“There you go…Are you okay?” you hear the voice say. Soon you head clears, your vision sharpens and you see that the thing that ran into you was a male….
141121211.title: Continue

1411212111.content:
"Yeah I'm fine." you tell the Jolteon as you shake yourself off a bit to get out the dirt and leaves that had stuck to your fur.

"Are you sure? I ran into you pretty hard..." he replies worriedly.

"I'm okay, trust me. Besides it's just as much my fault as it yours,I wasn't watching where I was going either." you assure him.

"Well if you say so. Heh, my brother always said you'll never never know who you'll run into around the forest, but I didn't think he meant it literally!" The two of you share a laugh at his joke for a minute or two before settling down. The Jolteon then outstretches his paw towards you and says "My name's Jason." You shake his paw with your own and reply with a smile "My name's Rose."

As you shake his paw you can't help but stare at Jason's body. While the little part of your mind that remains male is disgusted with you "checking out" another guy, it is quickly overwhelmed by the feminine mind that surrounds it. Your eyes trace over every inch of his body, noting with delight his handsome face, strong physique, and beautiful black eyes.

You're so entranced with Jason that you fail to notice that Jason is doing the same thing with you. Inside Jason's mind all he can think about is the beautiful Espeon in front of him. "She's the most beautiful girl I've ever seen!" he thinks to himself, "And that smile of hers! I don't know why but every time she smiles I just want to smile back!"

You continue to talk together for a few hours, telling each other about your families, your favorite hobbies and activities, even throwing in a couple of funny stories to further lighten the mood.

"Jason's such a nice guy!" you think to yourself as you continue to talk to each other, "He has a great sense of humor and doesn't seem to have any of the ego that the other males around here have. *Sigh* If only there were more guys like him, then maybe I wouldn't mind it so much when my sister tries to set me up with someone."

Jason, meanwhile, was having similar thoughts. "Not only is she pretty, she's super nice too! She's not one of those girls you usually see that are all looks and no personality. She tells funny jokes, she likes a lot of the same things I do and for whatever reason I just feel super happy whenever I hear her laugh! Why aren't there more girls like her around?"

The two of you continue to chat until you both notice the sun is starting to set. Reluctantly Jason tells you, "It's getting kind of late Rose I better head home."

"Yeah I better head back too." you reply but before you leave you tell Jason "It was so much fun hanging out with you today Jason and I was wondering if you wanted to meet up again next week? If you don't want to I completely understand..."

"No,no it's fine." He replies, "In fact that's great idea! Let's meet at Rainbow Lake next time at say, noon?"

"Sounds great!" you say and then, acting purely to the egging on of your female hormones, you get on your hind legs and give Jason a big hug. At first the Jolteon is surprised but he soon starts hugging you back. You stay in that hug for a few more seconds, loving the feeling of his strong arms wrapping around you and of your head resting softly on his warm chest.

Eventually the two of you break the hug and go your separate ways, both of you glad you have made such a great friend and secretly hoping that in time they might become something more.

The two show you your room, a small den a short way underground. Umbreon looks disappointed, most likely because you rejected his offer. He leaves while saying, "This is where you'll be staying. Don't oversleep. You have to wake up early for training."

Ezzy nuzzles you on the back of your neck. "Don't worry about him; I'm just glad you chose to be an Espeon. But make sure to wake up early, we don't have much time before they come." She leaves you alone in your room.

You paw at and lay on the makeshift 'bed' on the ground, but you can't fall asleep. Who are these Pokemon? Why are you a Pokemon? Who is "they," and why is everyone so strapped on time? Why is it so important that you evolve? You didn't sign up for any of this, and they could be dangerous Pokemon to hang around. You stand up and creep to the entrance. Neither Pokemon look like they're around. You decide to...
141122.title: Change your mind and be an Umbreon

1411222.content:
You bolt from the den, and immediately trip. Not the sneakiest of exits. You regain your composure and try running, but it feels extremely awkward. A part of you knows how natural and easy it is to run. Another part of you doesn't have a clue how to move these limbs. You settle for a compromise and look like a wobbly, drunk Eevee trying to escape.

You don't know where you're going, but you only care that it's away from here. Clearly, these Pokemon were being chased by something or someone. Well, maybe not so clearly, but they definitely had a baggage of trouble that you don't want to have around. You start to dodge trees and run faster as your movement encodes itself into your muscles.

Eventually, you run far enough that the trees become sparse and the landscape transforms into a plain, with a small pond in the distance. It's still night, and you take a break. On second thought, maybe this was a bad idea. But then again, they were random strangers who you didn't know and were forcing you to evolve.

In any case, you're beat and you just stayed up half the night. You find a spot: a small cove in a tree that you can wedge yourself in. You're not a survivalist; you don't know if this will actually keep you safe, but it sure feels like it.

You snuggle with the warm fuzzy rest of your body and appreciate just how comfortable you must feel.


You wake up. It's fairly late in the morning, and the sun's starting to reach high. You hop out of your little cove and ready yourself to head out. You still don't really know where you're going, but at this point, you're going to be starving soon. The pond's still there, a bit far away. As you head closer to it, you notice a man-made trail to the side. People must travel through here! That's good, right?

Upon passing you, she whispers "Sorry, Umbra can be, over confident sometimes. We'll talk again later, okay?" Ezzie runs down the same hallway to catch up with this 'Umbra'.

You turn to face Jolteon, Flareon, and Vaporeon. "So what will it be then?" the Flareon turns his head towards a pillow at the Vaporeon's paws. "Choose the gold stone, you'll turn into a Jolteon. The Jolteon nods, and doesn't seem to like talking much. "Take the red one and you'll look like me," he said "or use the blue one and you'll become a Vaporeon".

The Vaporeon looks at you and says "Make a wise decision, but please be fast. We have much to do today" the Vaporeon pauses "If you happen to choose the water stone, you'll be placed into special missions. The master likes water pokemon, you see". The Vaporeon winks at you.

The Flareon looks annoyed. "Ah-hem! What Mist meant to say was the master loves Fire pokemon, which is why he sends us on EXTRA special missions!" the Flareon and Mist glare one another in the eyes, while the Jolteon watched you.

How can you do this...? Oh well, whatever you choose, your pretty sure it will all work out...

You look down to what looked to be a purple ring pillow. Placed on it were three stones. One was a sapphire, one was ruby, and the other was golden. Making your decision, you lift your paw up and touch the...

The sensation was like nothing you have ever felt before. It was not painful, it tickled, but it was strange. It felt as if you were swallowing thousands of gallons of sea water, yet not gaining any weight or filling your stomach. Your skin felt moist and smooth, and your tail stretched out into a tail-fin thing. Your face felt cold and your ears became a sharper structure.

The sensation stopped, and you stood in shock before Mist. You turn your head toward the Flareon, who looked defeated. "So you chose the water stone, huh?" Mist said "Good decision!"

You couldn't say anything. You were still trying to recover your nerves back to a more normal feeling. But it was hard, you felt like a walking fish, dry but slippery.

"Well anyway, now that that is over with, why don't I show you to your new room? This one is no longer fit for you, so you don't need it anymore" Mist turned tail and walked out of the room, abandoning the pillow with the two remaining stones.

An elongated black tail sticks out from your back, with a lightning bolt shape on the end. Your feet are larger and brown, and your hands are finger-less.

You run over to a nearby river to see yourself. You have yellow sacs on your face, and your ears are yellow and brown and curled at the tip. You are a Raichu.

And boy, do you like it! You wouldn't have it any other way, you think to yourself.

You are speechless for a second. "I...I feel great! It makes me wonder why you Pikachu aren't evolved yet."

143211112212121111111111111.content:
At the Gym: "You two ready to battle?" asks Surge. You jump into the ring ready, willing, and able. For some reason you felt more intense than you've ever been before. "Yes Uncle, Let do this!" says Amelia excitedly. "Alright then lets get it started then. Raichu front and center!" says surge throwing the poke ball. You see a large Raichu emerge from it. "Alright then lets go." you say to the Raichu. "Ha, please, you don't stand a chance." responds the Raichu. "Don't underestimate me." you say. "Oh don't worry, I'm coming at you with everything!" say the Raichu getting ready to fight. "Alright that’s just the way I want it." you respond doing the same. "Let the battle begin." says the ref. Amelia doesn't waist any time and orders, "Shocky, use quick attack and combine it with tackle!" You do exactly that and ram the Raichu... but what’s this, the Raichu doesn't move an inch. You couldn't believe it as Raichu grabs you by you arms, picks you up, and throw you away from it. "How did you..." you start, but are cut off Raichu's laughing. "Ha ha ha ha! I told you, you don't stand a chance." it says laughing some more. "I'll show you!" you say as you run at it and give Raichu a shot with your Iron Tail. Raichu falls to the ground after that shot. "Ha! Whose laughing now tubby." you say with a laugh. "Impressive, I may have to fight seriously for the first time in a while." Raichu says as he climbs back to his feet. "Raichu, use take down!" orders Surge. Raichu comes at you and nearly flattens you as it tries to belly flop you, but you manage to dodge it. "Shocky, use Iron tail again!" orders Amelia. You do and knock it backwards, but it doesn't fall. "Raichu, use Thunder!" orders Surge. "Shocky, block it with your Thunder!" orders Amelia. Both you and Raichu use Thunder and they negate each other, causing smoke. "Raichu use Take Down now!" orders Surge. And with that, the Raichu comes out of the smoke into a belly flop. You try to dodge, but it's to late, Raichu lands on you burying you under it's body face down. "Oh no, Shock!" yells Amelia in fear and concern. "I told you, you can't beat me." says Raichu confidently. You try to get up, but it's to heavy. "Just give up." mocks Raichu. "Looks like your Pikachu is done Amelia. Might want to give up before your Pikachu is flattened." says Surge with confidence and laughs. "Shocky?!" Amelia yells even more concerned. You look to see she has tears in her eyes. When you see her tear you reach deep inside yourself. Suddenly Raichu find your lifting it. "Amazing, it's totally tapped of energy, but yet it's finding the strength to lift Raichu. He's certainly the perfect partner for Amelia." thinks Surge with a smile. Your on all four and finally you push yourself onto two legs, sending Raichu flying, but it just does a back flip and land heavily on two feet. "Why wont you just give up?" asks Raichu, a little frustrated. You don't give it an answer. You just stand there ominously. Then something happens.

What happens?...

A vein was popping out of your forehead from the extreme blinding rage. "Uh oh, that Pikachu is looking awfully intense. It must be using rage. This can't be good. thinks Surge. "Special." you say. "What?" asks Raichu, confused. "You think your Special. You do. I can see it in your eyes. I can see it when you laugh at me, look down on me, and walk around on me. I've had enough of this, and now I'm ticked off!" you respond angrily, looking into Raichu's eyes. Raichu is a little frightened, but it refuses to back down. You charge it with your quick attack combined with tackle once again and you ram into Raichu and manage to push it several inches backwards, but it refuses to fall. Raichu grabs your arms again, but before it throws you it gloats at you, "Ha! You aren't stronger than me." says Raichu gloating. "Oh yeah, well I've got something you don't." you say before it can throw you. "Oh and what’s that?" it asks bringing you close to it's face. "THIS!" you say as you head butt Raichu. Raichu stumbles a bit, but doesn't fall. You head butt it again and again. On the third try it lets go of you, but you grab it's arms and keep head butting it, over and over and over again. You head begins to grow red as well as Raichu's, but it still wont fall and you wont stop head butting it. Finally after ten head butts, Raichu falls and you jump back and land on your feet. Raichu begins to climb to it feet and is on all fours. "Oh no you don't. You say as you run at it on all fours with quick attack and head butt it one last time. You both stand there on all fours a second and the suddenly Raichu fall down unconscious. "Raichu is unable to battle. The winners are Amelia and her Pikachu, Shocky." says the ref ending the match. You stand up and fall on your rear shaking your head from the soreness of it. Amelia comes over to you ecstatic. "You did it Shock, we won!" says Amelia happily. She picks you up and hugs you. Her soft body feels good against your sore head. "You sure did." says Surge, calling back his Raichu to it's poke ball. "You two did a great job. It takes a lot of skill to defeat me. You earned this Thunder Badge." says Sure handing Amelia the badge. "Alright I got a Thunder badge!" celebrates Amelia. "I guess that means you'll be leaving on your own journey hah. I feared this day would come. My little niece has grown up into a fine young trainer." says Surge, placing a hand on her shoulder. "Uncle, thanks for everything." says Amelia, giving her Uncle a kiss on the cheek. "Well, if your going to be going on a journey, you'll need your rest. You've got one heck of a partner to go on your journey with Amelia." says Surge, turning his attention to you. "You take good care of my Amelia, you here." says Surge rubbing your head with his hand totally forgetting your sore. You don't mind really, you just nod you head. "So, when do you plan on leaving Amelia so I can get things prepared for you?" asks Surge. "I guess the sooner the better. Probably the day after tomorrow." Amelia responds, not completely sure. "Well then I guess I had better get preparing the stuff you'll need then." says Surge as he goes to get thing prepared. Amelia carries you outside and you both head home. The sun is shining and the winds of destiny are blowing as you head and Amelia head home to rest.

The Hyper Beam hit you and hurt badly. But you were able to take it, though it hurts too much to move very fast.

The Male grunt did pay enough attention to you to know that he hadn't took you out yet. But luck wasn't one your side for long.

The male grunt's Gyrados had recovered from the previous Hyper Beam at this point.

"Hyper Beam again Gyrados!" He yelled.

It charged up it's Hyper Beam and prepared to fire. You thought this was it. But if you were going down, you would take it head on without flinching.

Just then, as the Gyrados fired it's Hyper Beam, an electric attack cut through the beam and struck the Gyrados down.

"Who did that!?" The Male Grunt demanded to know.

He got his anwser as a Trainer walked into the Pokemon Center.

The Trainer was male, had a black shirt, red jacket with white short sleves, a red hat, red eyes, Black hair, blue jean's, and red and black shoes.

"Who are you?" The female demanded towards the boy.

He did not reply, and his Pikachu came in.

The Trainer swung his arm to the right and his Pikachu fired a Thunder attack towards the Rocket members, knocking them out.

The Police force got there not much after and took the Rockets away. "Thanks." You tell the Pikachu.

"It was no problem." His Pikachu replied.

"Thanks Trainer, I thought they were going to steal Shocky." Amelia said.

The Trainer Noded and walked away.
143211112212121111111111111122211.title: Down, but not Out, as well as Help.

1432111122121211111111111112.content:
"Let me out!" says a voice inside you. "What the... Who said that?" you think. "Let me out!" it says again. Suddenly you can't move and something or someone emerges.

Raichu is looking at with a confuse look on it's face. "Well are we going to finish this fight or not!?" it asks, frustrated. "Oh we're going to finish this alright and your not going to like the way it ends." you say with a dark smirk. Amelia saw the smirk and became slightly afraid. Suddenly an almost red aura seems to come off you and you hatred for this Raichu grew immensely. A vein was popping out of your forehead from the extreme blinding rage. "Uh oh, that Pikachu is looking awfully intense. It must be using rage. This can't be good." thinks Surge. "What wrong with you? Your freaking me out a bit." asks Raichu. "That's the problem with my other self. He's always wrapped up in things he cannot win...but now I here to make things all better. Ha ha ha!" you say with an dark laugh. "O...K...You've lost it." says the Raichu. "No, actually I think that would be you whose lost...lost this fight that is!" you say charging him. Suddenly you hand/paw glows with electrical power and...BAM! You punch Raichu right in the face and he goes flying backwards. "What the... I didn't think it was possible fore a Pikachu to learn Thunder Punch!" says Surge surprised at the sudden new attack. "Something’s wrong. Shocky isn't acting like himself." Amelia says very concerned about you. You charge Raichu again and hit it once more with a thunder punch and then you keep hitting it. Finally you last hit knocked it out. "Raichu is no longer able to battle, the winners are Amelia and her Pikachu, Shocky." announces the ref. Suddenly you realize something’s wrong. Raichu is definitely beaten, but you can't stop yourself from attacking. You body picks him up and hits him again and again. "Stop it! Stop it now!" you yell at yourself. Suddenly you stop. You here the other voice, the voice from before speak to you, actually it yells at you. "Keep out of this! It's no longer your fight! I'm in control now!" yells the voice angrily. "You! I thought I'd gotten rid of you!" you say realizing who it was. "Ha ha ha ha ha! No, you can't get rid of me. I'm you." it says laughing. "No, stop it! I'm in control! I'm in control! I'm in...CONTROOOOOOOOOL!!!" you scream. At that moment you suddenly rise into the air with electricity swarming wildly around you, your eyes glowing brightly with electricity. "What’s going on!" asks Amelia in a panic as electricity begins flowing around the room. "I think your Pikachu is trying to take control of whatever is going on with it!" says Surge whose gone into a duck and cover position. "Shocky!" yells Amelia, making her way to your area. "Amelia! Stay away from there! The amount of energy he's letting of is enough to fry us all!" yells Surge, trying to get Amelia to stop. She wouldn't stop. She couldn't stop. She could feel something was wrong with you and she was determined to help you. When she got close enough, she reached out for you slowly, trying to avoid the current of the electricity flowing through you. Finally she grabs your hand/paw firmly, but gently. You turn and look at her with you ominous glowing eyes. You didn't want anything to happen to her so you to her to "Get Away!" but to her, it sounded like an almost demon like "Pika!". "It OK Shocky, I'm here." she says gently with tears in her eyes. She gently pulls you to her and hugs you tightly to her ignoring the electrical burns on her hand from grabbing you. Slowly, but surly the electricity dwindle until it's nothing more that a few sparks in you cheeks. Feeling safe and more relaxed you close your eyes.
1432111122121211111111111112.title: RAGE!!! And something Darker!

"You gave us quite a scare back there." says Surge just entering the room, he seems pretty calm and he's smiling. You look away in shame. You can't bare to face him after what you did. Not only did he still defeat Raichu, but if you hadn't done what you did to stop him, he would have either seriously harmed himself or someone else and that entitle you to that Thunder badge as far a I'm concerned. You two have a deep connection with each other, cherish it." says Sure smiling and placing is hand on Amelia's shoulder. You both look at each other and smile. "Well, I've got to get back to the gym. Tell me when you plan on leaving for your journey." says Surge waving goodbye. Amelia waves goodbye to her Uncle and turns to you with a smile on her face. have to go. I can't risk hurting her again. I'm sorry.
143211112212121111111111111211.content:
You both arrive home. Throughout the entire remainder of the day, you couldn't stop thinking about that other you. "How did he come back after all this time. When I was a kid he was there whenever I was in danger and would take over for a short time. Well I guess it's because I haven't been in danger since then. I never thought my case of Schizophrenia would cause me so many problems. Now it seems he wants out for good." you thought to yourself sitting on the windowsill of Amelia's room looking up at the dark gray sky. That's when it came back. The events of earlier, of Amelia crying for you... and of how it's your fault her hands are burnt. You begin to cry. "How could I have hurt the one whose been so kind to me? How could I hurt someone so pure?" you thought as you cried. Amelia watches you from her bed. She can see your in deep thought. "What could he be thinking about?" Amelia wondered to herself. Then she saw you start crying. She immediately stood up and came over to you. She couldn't believe what she was seeing. You were crying for the first time. You hadn't cried since she first met you, no matter how much physical pain was inflicted and yet here you were crying and you weren't even battling. "What's wrong Shocky? Why are you crying?" she asks as she leans on the windowsill with her still bandaged hands so she was right next to you. You look over at her and you look down at her hands and then look back up at her with a sad look on your face. Amelia almost immediately realized you were crying over what happened to her. "I'm glad you care so much about me, but you need to stop blaming yourself. Whatever happened is over and done with." she says with a reassuring smile picking you up and bringing you back to the bed with her. She sits on the bed and holds you against her gently. You two sit like this for nearly ten to fifteen minutes before the voice of her mother calls her for supper. As you both go to supper you can't help, but think, "I wish I could be as positive as you Amelia."

That night, you were both in her bed snuggled together, but you couldn't sleep. You were still thinking about the other you. You kept asking yourself, "What if it happens again? What if he takes over completely? What if you couldn't stop him?" Then the worst question of all revealed itself, "What if he tried to hurt Amelia?" You can't take it anymore you have to decide once and for all.

You wanted to stay with Amelia, but dare I risk staying with Amelia or even though she will be sad do I leave to protect the one I care for most?

Which will it be? I...
143211112212121111111111111211.title: Painful Decisions

choices: Nod: Go and meet the other pikachus
Shake: Stay here and get your head together again
1432111122121211111111111112111.content:
Because this is a decision that will affect the rest of your new life, it was inevitable that negotiations would take more than 30 seconds, so you decided to sleep on it, which shouldn't be too hard as you are knackered form that days battling. Just then Amelia, who had changed into her pajamas, came into the room and saw you on the windowsill, looking slightly fallourn

"Awwww, what's wrong Shocky", she asked, gently scratching your ears.
"Nothing", you reply. Of course, Amelia doesn't know that. She just hears a tired "Pika" and assumes you are just that.
"You must be really tired little guy", she says, picking you up softly,"Don't worry, we can easily fix that", and with that, she climbed under the covers, laid you by her side, and the both of you drifted off to varying degrees of sleep.

While Amelia slumbered peacefully, thinking of what to do now that she had the Thunder badge, your dreams were less serene. In your head, a violent and bloody war was unfolding. The two sides were the stayers and the fleers. You wanted to stay more than run, so the stayers had a larger army, but fleeing was a more logical choice, so they were more advanced. The battle raged on all through the night.

By morning it was down to the two commanders, fighting it out with swords and shields. The skirmish was paused for a moment, as you looked around and saw that Amelia was gone.

"Oh god, not again", you shouted, as you thought you had switched bodies again, but then you realised you hadn't, as Amelia skidded into the room to see why she had heard the loud "Pika Pi"

"Good morning sleepy-head", she said softly, as she came over and patted your fuzzy head. "You must have been more tired than I thought". It's then that you saw the clock, 11:30am, and hear your stomach rumble, well it was 15 hours since you last ate.

"I thought you'd be hungry by now Shocky, here you go", and she fed you a poke treat. I could never leave someone as kind as her you think to yourself, as the fleeing commander in your head is killed, and you leap into the air to hug her. Or, try to hug Amelia, but with 6 inch arms, it was never going to happen.

"I'm glad you liked that", she said hugging you back, blissfully unaware of the scene in your head. "My friends have come over, and they've all got Pikachus, which is why I wanted to catch you so badly. Do you want to go and meet them?" she asks, "just nod or shake your head"
1432111122121211111111111112111.title: The battle of the conscience

choices: They start to play a game
14321111221212111111111111121111.content:
You nod your yellow head, and she takes you to the pikachus in the lounge. There you notice that one of them looks vaguely familiar. And you seem to recall seeing the others somewhere as well. Then it hits you. They were all at the pikachu community you woke up at, and the one that looks familiar, was the one that went to the town with you.

As Amelia puts you down, she says"My friends caught them where I caught you, so you might recognise them".

You walk over to them, and your old friend instantly recognised you.

"I told you not to take that trail", he said. "We went looking for you down that trail, and then they ambushed us. But, I gotta say, trainers are a lot nicer than they are made out to be".

"That's 'cause ours are girls", said another, in a deep slow voice.
"They all think we're adorable, and, to be honest, I can't blame them", said a British accented one.
"Yeah, they're ok", said the final one, a New Yorker,"but they give us stupid names".
"Why", you ask him,"what's your's".

"I'm Piter" (pronuonced peter), he replies.
"I'm Thunder", says your friend.
"Thor", chips in the Brit.
"And I'm Pika", says the deep voice."Tell us yours then."
"Shock", you reply. Then you ask"So what do we do now?", you ask.

When you wake up, there seems to be a lot of activity nearby, so you decide to find out what it was. A large platform had been built, with speakers and a turntable. A guy in his twenties was shouting to a large crowd, and the penny dropped. Five years ago today, Team Rocket was disbanded.

"OK, our next song is request from T Blair and G Bush, who say that this is what they wanted to be", shouts the guy on stage. The crowd starts cheering as the record starts. The song is "Together Forever".

As the song plays, the crowd start dancing, but you stay still. You can't stop thinking about Amelia.
"Why did I leave?", you ask yourself.
"Mmmmeee", answers a demonic voice.

You continue to stand there for a couple of minutes, until the song ends, in an almost trance-like thought. But when the song ends, you hear a strangely familiar voice.
"SHOCKY, SHOCKY, WHERE ARE YOU!", Amelia was looking for you.

You quickly run up a nearby tree, holding on to one of the more slender branches, as it has more leaves, so your almost invisible. Amelia walks right under you, looks around, and turns away, dejected. Just then

143211112212121111111111111211211.content:
CRACK

"What was that", you say to yourself, turning around. The branch has snapped, almost in two. This particular branch, hangs out over the road, and you can see a truck speeding towards you. You try and inch back to safety, but it's to late, and you plummet head-first.

You pray that you don't get run over, but what does happen is beyond belief. Somehow, your head hits the truck's roof, and sends you flying. The pain in your skull in unbearable, and you crash to the ground.

Amelia runs over to you, and picks you up.
"Shocky?", she splutters. You give a small smile, and a tiny nod, before you black out.

choices: Nurse Joy needs to run some tests
1432111122121211111111111112112111.content:
Though everything's gone black, you hear small snippets of what's being said. You hear Amelia's voice, Lt Surge's and a high pitched one you haven't heard before.

But then, nothing, not single sound...

You slowly open your eyes, and realise that you're not outside anymore. You open them fully, and see that your in the pokemon centre, on a small bed. Your head feels strangely heavy, and you bring your paw up to it. There is a thick coer of bandages around your head, and it was incredibly sore when you touched it.

Then, you hear a small sob, and look to your left, where it came from. Amelia is kneeling beside your bed, her face buried into the duvet. You can tell she's crying, because of the small damp patch near her face.

She moves her hand over to pet your head, and turns her face to look at you. The moment she sees that you're awake, her face lights up with happiness, and she throws herself over your tiny form, giving you an almost bone breaking hug.

"Ohh, Shocky, I'm so glad you're alright," she squeals between sobs of happiness, "I've been so worried!"

She conttinues to hug you tightly for a good five minutes. "Might as well face it," you think to yourself happily, "I'll never be able to get away from her," and you return her hug with a large grin.

"Can I see them?" you ask, "sure if you think you're up to it" Amelia replies. "Well what are we waiting for, lets go." You hop out of the bed and begin following Amelia. "So how does it feel, being a pokemon" Amelia asks out of the blue. "Weird, I guess, it's hard to explain," you begin. "I feel normal, like everything in my body is natural, like how a pikachu moves, as well as Pokemon attacks like thunder bolt, but there is always this nagging feeling at the back of my head, like when I'm given orders, I feel a strong sense to rebel." You explain as Amelia listens intently. "That is weird." She finally speaks after a while. She still seems tense, after all she's never spoken to a pokemon/human before. "Hey, what do you know about these guys?" You look up and ask. "Well, Professor Oak is a world renowned pokemon specialist, he knows almost everything about pokemon and Ash Ketchum is a famous trainer who has seen so many things, you should hear a story or two about his adventures ." 14321222.title: Captured...

143212221.content:
You can't believe it. Your first day as a Pokemon, and you've been captured! With ease! You try to let this sink in as you wait in the darkness for your new Trainer to call you out.

After what seems like hours of wallowing in self-pity, you feel a strange sensation and are released from your tiny prison. You look around, expecting to pop out into a fight, but don't see an enemy. Instead, you're sitting on the desk of a Pokemon Center looking at Nurse Joy.
"Take care of him Nurse Joy!" your trainer calls out. Nurse Joy nods and looks at you.
"Well, I'm glad Johnny caught a new Pokemon, but look at you! Covered in scrapes and bruises! It's a wonder you're allright!" she exclaims. She picks you up and places you on a machine and fiddles with a few settings before disappearing through a door. A Chancey walks through it and walks up to you.
"Well, good afternoon! I'm Chancey, and I'll be your attendant until my mistress returns!" it said with a smile. You sigh and look away.
"Yeah. Well, I'm not so happy right now."
"Aww. Why?"
"Because I've just been captured. You know- freedoms taken away and replaced with the little urge to obey." This seemed to discomfort the cheerful medicine-minded Pokemon, and silence soon followed.
After some time had passed, Nurse Joy came back to check on you. A little while longer and Johnny returned to pick you up. He put you back in your Pokeball, and you waited for your next small taste of freedom.

You began to lose all sense of time in your little world of darkness. It was overwhelming. The only thing you felt were the swaying steps he took. Madness was always on the brink, always delayed with little mind games you invented to keep your sanity and help pass the time. Just as you began to question whether or not keeping your mind was worth it, you suddenly felt the strange sensation of being released from your minuscule cage.
You looked around, again expecting to be summoned in the heat of battle. But, once again, you weren't needed to fight. Instead, you were in a small coffee shop, surrounded by people you assumed to be friends of your master.
"Check it out. One Pikachu captured in the forest outside of town!" Johnny bragged. You wanted to run, to try to escape, to do SOMETHING, but that nagging little feeling in the back of your mind soon overpowered your dreams of freedom. As Johnny droned on about your capture (which was extremely exaggerated ), you decided to lie down and look out the window. You stared freedom right in the face. The outside was mere feet away, but it had never felt farther. One of Johnnys friends was asking about you, which caught your attention.
"When did you catch him?" he asked.
"Oh, a while ago." came the vague reply.
"How long, exactly?"
"Um...one or two weeks ago." Small talk followed. You had just about dozed off when they started talking about you again.
"What's with your Pikachu, anyway? He's been staring out that window the whole time."
"Yeah. It seems to me like he's kinda...depressed." Your trainer looked at you. An awkward silence followed.
"It's about time somebody noticed!" You said to yourself.
"What do you mean by that?"Johnny asked.
The group was quiet.
"Uh...Johnny?"
"What?!"
"Did you say that? 'Cause, we didn't!"
Your trainer stood with a quizzical look. They all looked down at you. Then you realized something: apparently, you didn't entirely loose your gift of human speech. At least, that was how it seemed to be.
You looked up at them, your mind unable to comprehend this incredible ability you still possessed, despite your new form. Then, you did the first thing that popped into your head, which was to...

You start tearing up, wondering who you originally were, before you turned into a Pikachu. "I can't remember, I can't..." You whisper, starting to cry. Who was your family? Did you live in the Pokemon world? How old were you?

Will you ever go back?

Then Johnny caught me and I moped for a while, until recently I started to enjoy it." You tell them. "By the way, what were you running from?" You ask Pikachu, "And where did that scar come from?"

Then a Chikorita runs out, and sees your group, and runs towards it.

"Oh God there he is!" Pikachu yells, running away.

"Oh no..." Chikorita says under her breath, getting in front of the group. "Get behind me." She growls.

"What? Why?" You ask, confused.

"Trust me."

The other Chikorita runs at her, and passes her and your group, leaving a Stun Spore-like powder.

"No!" Chikorita yells, running at him at top speeds as, one by one, your groups falls unconcious.
14321222122121112121121211.title: Be prepared for weird

choices: Something explodes or something like that.
14321222122121112121121212.content:
"Oh yeah, the thing that was chasing me was huge!" He says, looking behind him worriedly.

Then something in the woods crashes, startling your entire group. And, out of the woods came a giant, Pikachu? It looked robotic!

"Oh God there it is!" Pikachu yells, running in the other direction.

"Wait!" You yell, and immediately get into a defensive stance along with your group.

"What... Is that?" Johnny asks himself, as the mechanical behemoth moves forward.
14321222122121112121121212.title: I guess not

143212221221211121211212121.content:
(Bear with me here, I'm not good at action scenes which is why I was hoping for someone good to add another chapter)

You had always loved the idea of fighting robots. You read a bunch of stories and always imagined it. You never thought of how scary it would be, you always assumed your characters weren't afraid because they were adults. That is, you never knew how scary it would be until now.

You waited for something to happen. It seemed like ages until a low, manly voice sounded. It was obviously coming from the fake Pikachu. "So," The voice began to say, "what do we have here? A kid and some Pokemon?" He chuckled, "Oh look! A Pikachu! We need one of those."

You flinched when he mentioned you. You didn't want to be taken, you personally liked having friends by you. You prepped a charge of energy. The mechanoid walked towards you, and tried to grab you, it was a lot faster than it looks. You await Johnny's command.
143212221221211121211212121.title: Team Rocket! Right?

1432122212212111212112121211.content:
"Thunderbolt!" Johnny yells to you. "And Razor Leaf!", to Chikorita. You both attack it, while Eevee and Johnny hang back.

Nothing works.

When Johnny realizes this, he yells for us to stop, and to retreat (I know, that one choice that doesn't matter). The mystery man seizes the opportunity and grabs your tail. You are pulled away, and Johnny and Eevee (somehow) don't notice, but Chikorita does.

She runs towards you, jumps, and grabs your paws. She uses her vines to grab your body and she pulls. You eventually (again, somehow) get pulled out and you are sent flying. You hold onto Chikorita as you fly to a distant place. (Just imagine it like Team Rocket blasting off.)
1432122212212111212112121211.title: Thunderbolt!

14321222122121112121121212111.content:
Your paws slip, but her vines are too tight. (I made it sound like that's a bad thing, oops.) You land with a thud on a small island. You are about to get up when you hear Chikorita land and a-

A snap.

"Chikorita!" You yell, startling all the Pokemon nearby.

You bolt towards her, her vines are still extended, even though they are not connected to you. She is laying on her side, struggling to get up. Her back left leg is bruised badly and is bleeding while her front right leg looks broken. There are tears in her eyes.

You clean the wound and bandage it, thunderclouds start rolling in, so you slowly put her on your back and she, trying to help, tightens it with her vines. You walk along a path and, after a while, it starts raining. You quicken your pace. After what seems to be an eternity, you reach a tree with an abandoned den inside. You lay her down on a bed of grass. You've never had a broken leg before, or even knew how to treat one, and there isn't a Pokécenter in miles!

You lay down next to her, unable to sleep for a long, long time.
14321222122121112121121212111.title: That's a problem

143212221221211121211212121111.content:
After a terrible, terrible dream, you woke up. Chikorita was awake, and was nursing her broken leg. "Good morning." She says. "G'morning." You, in turn, say. "Were you okay last night?" She asks you. "Yes, why?"

"You were sobbing in your sleep."

"Really?" You respond, trying to remember your dream last night.

"Yeah, you were."

Your day goes on, you keep trying to find your way out of the forest, but you keep, somehow, get turned back every time. Eventually, at evening, you had figured out to make a cast for Chikorita, and you were about to lay down to sleep when:

"Hello??" Avoice rings out, female, "I'm lost! Is anyone here?!"

"What was that?" You ask Chikorita.

She shrugs, "Why don't you go and investigate?"

You agree, and follow the yells until the trees slowly turn up less.

'How did she get lost on the smallest- wait.' You think, then chuckle to yourself. 'We got lost here.' You eventually break into a clearing, where a young girl, about 12 years old, is sitting next to a tree, crying softly.

You walk up to her and she looks up, still crying, just a bit. "Are you okay?" You ask, only to remember you can't speak English. (Really, it only sounds like "Pi Pikachu?")

"Oh, hello." She says, hiccoughing. "Oh!" She exclaims, as if only really noticing you, "Hi!" She says, jumping up. She was wearing ripped jeans, probably because she got in a fight or something, and her T-shirt was ripped at the sleeves and she had a scar on her face. "Do you have a place, a cabin or something, I can stay at?" She asks. You shake your head.

"Oh, okay then." She says, a bit depressed. It is night, and you better hurry back, but you don't want to leave the poor girl alone. What do you do?
143212221221211121211212121111.title: A Lost Stranger

1432122212212111212112121211111.content:
You jump up and grab her hand, causing her to crouch down. "What is it?" She asks, visibly shaken. "I have a den nearby that you can stay at!" You say, knowing perfectly well she can't understand you. You try to pull her along. "Do you want me to follow you?" She asks. You nod, and she follows you.

Not too long after, you lead her to the den. Chikorita was awake, "Pikachu? Is that you?" She asks. "Yeah!" You say. The girl has to squeeze into the space. "Is this who was yelling?" Chikorita asks. "Yeah, she is."

"Is this your den?" She asks quietly. "Yeah." You say, nodding. She lays down in the corner, happy she found somewhere, and falls asleep. "Did she tell you her name?" Chikorita asks. "No, she didn't." You respond. You feel like you know her from somewhere...
1432122212212111212112121211111.title: A New Friend

choices: Try your best to explain to Amber
14321222122121112121121212111111.content:
You fell asleep pondering it, who is it? Your dreams are just as disturbing as ever. In fact, one was so much so that you woke up because of it. The girl and Chikorita were still asleep. It was the crack of dawn.

You studied her face for a minute, then, as soon as Chikorita woke up, you realize who it was.

Your best friend since first grade.

As close as siblings.

Her name is....

—————

During school at lunchtime, you see, across the cafeteria, a girl your age sitting alone at a table far away, crying. You walk to her and ask: "Hey, are you okay?"

"Yeah, I'm fine." She says, obviously lying. "Come on, what's wrong?" You ask, setting your tray down and sitting down. She eventually looks up, her eyes red from crying. She has a huge gash on the side of her cheek.

"Oh my gosh!" You (almost) yell. She hides it with her hand and looks back down, as if she's ashamed. "What•how•why?!" You stammer.

She wouldn't speak.

For days upon end, she wouldn't speak.

She would occasionally come back to school looking worse.

Finally, almost a month later, she says something.

"I don't, I can't..." She starts, then tears up. "Okay, calm down, if you want to tell me, you can." You say.

"Okay."

"My name is Amber Rose and at my house my dad, he, he..." "It's okay, continue."

—————

Amber... Rose...

You hadn't realized you had been out for more than an hour. Funny how dreams work? You sat up when Chikorita shook you awake. "Pikachu!" She yelled. The girl, Amber, was awake, trying to sit comfortably. "Chiko...rita..." You start, "I know who she is." You, well, you finish. "Who is it?"

"An old friend of mine, Y'know, from when I was human?" You answer, she understands, she believes you.

"Her name is Amber Rose."
14321222122121112121121212111111.title: Before

choices: Something a little embarrassing about her
Something a little embarrassing about you
143212221221211121211212121111111.content:
"It's okay, continue. You can trust me." You say, not caring about the staring eyes behind you. "He, well, he, at home-sorry- he doesn't c-care about..." She tears up again. "Come on, don't cry, I'm listening." "He doesn't care *hic* care about m-me. *hic* He-he hurts me w-with his jerkish *hic* friends. He doesn't treat me... like a daughter."

"Shouldn't you tell someone?" You say, worried. "No! I can't! He said if I do, he'll, he'll..." "Ignore him, then."

"What?" She responds. "You can call the-the police or someone!" You say. Lunch had ended. "I, I can't do that, he said he will-" "Do it. I'll be there, I'm your friend, rember?"

—————

How could you tell her? She can't understand Pokemon, and- wait. Didn't it just rain? You poke Ambers leg and point outside. "Do you want me to follow you?" She says, straining it a bit, because of her position. You nod, and she crawls out. You find a stick small enough to hold, but thick enough not to break, and write something in the mud.

Your name is Amber Rose, right?

She looked surprised, "Yes it- Wait. D-did I say that? And you can write?" She says, you nod, and write down this:

I'm your friend, Jose (at that exact moment, some water falls from a leaf above and ruins it. Aaaand soaking you.) You heard Chikorita snort behind you. You glare back at her, and right this:

I'm your friend, Joseph Whit-

You are interrupted by Amber gasping, she looks at you for conformation, and you respond by adding the 'e' at the end of White (then a period). She picks you up, (much to your surprise and Chikorita's humor) and asks this: "If you are Joseph, then how did you- wha?" She can't seem to accept it, "If you really are Joseph, then write something only you would know." She then puts you down.

Still not sure what to think of her picking you up, you write down this:
143212221221211121211212121111111.title: Abused

choices: She knows how to heal it
She has absolutely no idea how to heal it
1432122212212111212112121211111112.content:
"Amber! Who's this?!" Her dad yells, you had just went to her house to confront him. "Mr Rose, you should be in jail right now." You say, grabbing a Pokèball, just in case. "Sir, Amber told me everything about what you did and none of it is right!" You yell that last part, "SHE'S YOUR DAUGHTER!!"

He grins.

"Why should I care? She is mine." He says, cocky. "WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU?!" You yell, ignoring your no-cussing rules. He pushes you off the steps of the porch, causing you to fall onto the concrete, giving you a concussion, and he tries to pull Amber in. "Let's go, I have something to do."

"No." Amber says, "I will not come in." "What was that?" He says, his smile diminishing. "I will not come with you." She says, pulling back, "Not after what you did to me, or my FRIEND!" She gets free, and helps you up. Everything was white and blurry, your head was in intense pain, but you couldn't speak. Her dad, now fuming, runs after her. "Go without me." You manage, "I can make it..." Then you pass out.

'I once nearly walked outside to greet you before school with an (you pause) inadequate amount of clothing'

Chikorita, who limped over to you, sniggered, then started laughing so hard she started crying. Amber chuckles, "Okay, *heh* I believe you. But how?" She suddenly remembered you were a human turned Pikachu, "How, in the world, did you turn into a Pikachu?!" You shrug, then hurry to get rid of the sentence.

After an hour of writing in the mud (which was slowly drying, making it harder and harder), you explain the previous events. "So, you got caught soon after by some guy named Johnny, then..." She ponders it, "Yeah, for something so complicated, I think I get it." She looks over at Chikorita and (again, somehow, I didn't include this before so I decided to do it now) notices the cast on her leg, "Holy- what happened to you?!" She says, running to her and studying her leg. "Well, we fell from the sky." You say, motioning it, because the ground is dry. "Oh my gosh..."
1432122212212111212112121211111112.title: Hardy-har har

14321222122121112121121212111111121.content:
You wake up in your bed, no wait, this is a hospital bed. You try to sit up, but a searing pain in your head forces you back down. You look around, Amber is sitting there with your parents. They are talking, but you can't hear anything, only a loud ringing noise. Then Amber notices you and jumps up and stands at your side, yelling (you think) for your parents. They run over, tears in their eyes. You pass out again.

After a long while, the ringing fades away, but your voice isn't working correctly. "What happened?" You manage to say. "Josh? Oh my gosh! You're awake!" Amber says, excitedly. "You? But, your dad, and-" "He's in prison." She says, "I used one of your Pokèmon to hold him back while I called the police." She rubs a Charmander standing next to her on the head. "Heh, good job, Char." "Char!" He says, proud of himself.

"Here," Amber says, rummaging through her pack, "take these berries." "Why?" Chikorita asks, tilting her head. "These will slowly mend tissue in grass type Pokemon, I carry a bunch for different types, just in case." Chikorita eats some, and says "I don't feel any different." She was right, she still had to limp. "They take effect soon after eating them, but it doesn't happen immediately." Amber says, seeming to understand.

"Wait, Chikorita!" You yell, suddenly remembering something, "We have to find Johnny!" This made Chikorita freeze. "Oh my gosh, I completely forgot!" She said, limping towards you, "What should we do?" "What are we talking about?" Amber asks. You (somehow) motion it to her. "Oh! That does seem important!" She says, "But how're we gonna get off this island?" "She's right." You say, looking around, "How are we?"
14321222122121112121121212111111121.title: Berries fix everything!

choices: Walk around the Forest with the Pikachu
Stay here - you're too exhausted to go anywhere
14322.content:
"Maybe not," you tell him, "What if I get lost in town? Or someone tries to capture me? I think it's probably best to stay here for now."

The other Pikachu nods, "Okay then." he says, "Anyway, I'm taking a stroll around the forest, do you wanna come with me? While you're here you may as well take sometime to explore your new home."
14322.title: Where next?

choices: Run after him and get back in time for the gathering...
Decide you can't be bothered and run off by yourself...
143221.content:
"Good idea, I'll come." you tell him.

The Pikachu shows you around the forest a bit. He shows you the Thunderstone then leads you to a small river. You meet a few other pokemon along the way aswell.

"Let's go back now, the Pikachu gathering will be soon." your friend tells you.

"Gathering?" you reply.

Your Pikabuddy is already running back through the forest.
143221.title: Walk around the Forest with the Pikachu

choices: Why did my 'friend' accept that I was a human so fast?
1432211.content:
After stumbling through the forest, you make it to the gathering to find all the Pikachu gathered together around a stump. You see you friend off on the side and you join him.

"Welcome to the afternoon meeting!" a Pikachu, now on the log, yelled "As you all could probably tell, a new wave of Pikachu have been let into the colony! By now you all should know the rules of the colony, but I will repeat them any ways. Rule number one, never..."

The Pikachu rambled on about the rules, role changes and other news for some time, but you tuned out early on and started thinking about...
1432211.title: The stump of leadership

choices: Talk to some of the Pikachu
143222.content:
"No thanks," you tell him, "I think I'll stay here for now."

"Sure, I'll be back in 10 minutes or so," he replies, "In the meantime, why don't you talk to the other Pikachu and get to know them a bit better."
143222.title: Stay here...

144.content:
You take a deep look into the tank in front of you. You can faintly make out a reflection in it. The Problem is that even though it's your reflection, it's not you. It's a leathery, pink skinned, utter bearing cow pokemon, Miltank. You continue to overlook yourself. An Utter sticks out from your lower body, and sags. Instead of fingers or toes, you have hooves. And Pink leathery skin.

Yeah, this isn't normal at all. You look around the ranch. Other than the fact Pokemon are real, this just keeps getting stranger. You walk up on your hind legs to another Miltank with an idea. "Hello?" You say, with a hybrid of Moos and a human tounge.

"Hello." Says the Miltank, and it continues eating it's grass.

Sweet! You can talk to other pokemon.
144.title: Miltank

1441.content:
You slowly trudge along. You're very careful. A cow walking on two legs isn't the most stable way to get around. You somehow get over the fence, and end up in the stables where Ponyta and Rapidash eat oats.

"Hello." You moo once more.

"What do you want?" One Rapidash barks at you.

"Just want to tal-"

Rapidash leaps and comes straight over the gate. "Shut up, you damn cow." You can see flames building up in it's mouuth. Afraid, you quickly roll up into a ball and without realizing it...
1441.title: Unfriendly Pony

14412.content:
You roll your almost blubery body into a ball and instantly begin to roll. It was just an instinct. You roll and roll and roll. Crashing though the fence, the barn gates, and when you get to dizzy to go on, you find yourself back beside the Miltank you had seen before.

"Whats with you on your hind legs?" She asks.

You shrug, and see no reason to lie. "I'm not really a Miltank... I'm a human, so it's new to me."

The other miltank looks at you weirdly, but accepts it. Maybe it thinks you're crazy.

"So how do you know what gender you are?" You ask, looking at your utters. You could feel them gennerally fillying and watched as they puffed up. They felt very strange.

"Gender?" The other said "Well, all us Miltank are girls, and the Touros on the other side of the farm are male." The two didn't look very much alike, but I guess they could both be related somehow.

You went and walked around the field a bit and found out it was easier to walk on all fours in this new body of yours. Without the belly, or the utters hanging in front of you. Then you hear a bell ring and you look around for the source. Its comming from the barn and all the milktank are heading in. What do you do?
14412.title: First day as a Milktank.

144121.content:
Seeing as all the Miltanks were going inside, you figured you had to as well. You slowly lean forward and get on all fours. The groups slowly gets in small stables, but without doors or anything to keep you inside. You find an empty one to occupy. A farmer slowly goes from stable to stable.

You wait patiently, you can hear the other Miltank talking about where to pasture later and such, and then the farmer comes to your stable. He places a bucket underneath you, and you get curious. Suddenly, he tightly grips your utter and squeezes.
144121.title: So That's where the Milk in Miltank comes from

choices: Now that you'rre off the farm, RUN
1441211.content:
He tightly grips an utter and squeezes it. You raise your new hoof and are about to stomp on the farmer's bucket where all your milk is going, when he moves out of the way before you get the chance to hit him.

"Hey Fred! Come see this!" The frightened farmer says. The second farmer comes and looks at the damage you have done. You've left a hole going through the center of the bucket.

"Mighty' fine Milktank you got there, and it's not going to let you milk it." said the second farmer. "In fact, my son was looking for a good pokemon to start off with for his pokemon journey. Why not give him this one, since it won't milk and all..."

You liked the sound of this. This way you wouldn't have to be milked, and you could perhaps find a way to get back to your human body, or atleast another one. You sure as hell weren't getting it back hanging around here. Your current owner liked the idea of this aswell and went to the back room to pull out a pokeball. He comes back and you are put inside the pokeball.

***


When your next released from the small confined ball, your out in an open plain with a boy who looked to be your age. Or at least the age of your body before you switched.

"Hi" He said. "I'm Will. My Dad told me how strong you were, and I was kinda hoping you would be my partner for my journey. Together we'll beat the leaders of every gym and make our way through the Pokemon League!"

You chuckle at how cheesy he sounds. Now...
1441211.title: Leaving the Farm

14412112.content:
The thought of running now coursed through your mind, but you mastered it and decided to stay with this Will. At least for now. Who knows, maybe you'll find a way to change back.
 
In agreement, you let out a soft 'moo' sound and look up at Will. He smiles and says "Well then I guess we should start training then!" You follow Will for about half a mile before you hear a rustle from an isolated bush nearby. Before you even have a chance to look, Will shouted "Okay Miltank, use that stomp attack!" You turn to face a roselia that is less than half your height.
 
Roselia looks up at you and says "Please don't hurt me!" she sounded scared. You...
14412112.title: Training

144121121.content:
You aim down a bit and crush a small grass patch in-front of her, "Play unconscious," you whisper to her.
She falls onto the floor.
"Alright!" Will cries victoriously, he took a red and white ball and though it and the Roselia "Go pokeball!"
It made contact with her and she was absorbed in.
The ball rolled to the left and then to the right, and back to the left before stopping in center and finalized the capture.
Will walked over to the pokeball, picked it up in one hand, raised it to the air and screamed, "We caught Roselia!!"
Then.....
144121121.title: Spare her

choices: Refuse to go near a Tauros
Find the good looking Tauros and... Settle Down
1441212.content:
You generally let him milk you at first, as your utter is feeling bloated. In every squese on one of your nipples, a sigh of releif comes over you. As soon as he's done, you curl up in the bay of hay and start to think on how you ended up in this female cow body. You didn't plan on staying like this for long.

You forget about it and fall asleep chewing a substance that feels like gum in your mouth.

***


The next morning, your utter was bloated once again and the farmers came in for a morning milking. Then they lead your heard out into a field. The first thing you notice is that this wasn't the same field as last day. It looks familar, but your don't realise where you are untill you see another pokemon. Tauros.

You quickly remember the other Miltank telling you that in this feild were Tauros, The males.

"What are they doing to us?" You quickly ask the Milktank standing beside you.

"There breeding us again so we produce milk." She replies.

You gulp. You hadn't planned on being a cow, which are girls. You also hadn't planned on being milked by someone. But this was going too far...
1441212.title: Breeding

choices: You wake up as the bell rings!
One of the farmers find you!
14412121.content:
You separate yourself from the group, heading for a place that was fairly isolated with ferns and laid down. You watched as the herd of Miltank thinned until the last one had found a Tauros and was led away to breed.

You chewed on the grass, absentminded, as you waited for the bell to go back inside. Slowly you drifted off to sleep, surely a short nap wouldn't hurt, right?
14412121.title: They'll never find me!

14412122.content:
You walk over to the Tarous and sit down. "What do you want?" He snorts.
"Would you like a mate?" you ask.
"Uhhh sure."the Tarous says.



What do you do now?
14412122.title: Find the good looking Tauros and... Settle Down

145.content: What's that? Do you have a leaf shaped tail and green skin? Are you Treeko?
145.title: Treeko?

1451.content:
You look around cautiously. You're in a forrest, and in a tree, on a branch, high, high, high up. You cling to the branch with your life, and notice something as you embrace it. Your arms are green, and scaley. Nervously, you lift your hand to look at it, and you slip.

As you fall for through the air, you desperately force yourself to the tree, and stop. To your surprise, you've clung straight to the side of the tree. Slowly, and carefully, you climb down, your arms and legs securing themselves saftley with every step downwards.

"Woah, this is so cool!" You shout out, as you look over your body. You've been turned into a real live Treeko! You're a pokemon!
1451.title: Tree of Horror

14511.content: You head back up the tree, and on the way you spot a Caterpie. What next?
14511.title: Go back up the Tree

14512.content: You decide to explore the forest and get to know it better. Should you explore in the trees or on the ground?
14512.title: How?

145121.content:
You decide to jump from tree to tree.
You reach a clearing in the middle of the forest.
You notice something going on in the middle of the clearing.
145121.title: In the trees

1451211.content: You decide to investigate, and found out there is a Mightyena running amok, sniffing at everything in sight. It suddenly turns it's attention up to you and barks, making you tumble from the tree. "Mightyena, what is with all the noise?" Professor Birch appeared from a tent, followed by a Torchic and a Mudkip. "Mi mi," Mightyena growled, directing it's attention to you. You feel like running away, but find you are too injured to move. "Must have been a long fall," You think as Prof. Birch crouches beside you and starts spraying a potion on you. "I guess I need to find it's trainer...Torchic, Mudkip, keep it company, Mightyena, follow me. As Birch walks off with Mightyena at his side, the Mudkip walks up to you. "Treeko, you're soooooo cute!" He exclaims loudly, his eyes shimmering. You blink. "Huh?" You say quietly. Right. You're now a Treeko. "Mudkip means that it is nice to meet you. Right, Mudkip?" The Torchic says. "Soooo...cute," Mudkip replies. "Mi! Ena!" Prof. Birch's Mightyena barks, emerging with Birch himself. "My lucky day, my last day of just studing common pokemon and I find a wild Treeko!" He exclaims, and pulls out a pokeball. "Would you like to come with me?" Birch asks you.
1451211.title: A Breathing Tree? No?

14512111.content: Seeing as you were badly injured you decide that if you stayed you could have been hurt far worse than in the careful hands of birch so...
14512111.title: To the lab! (Yes)

1452.content: You Wake Up Feeling You Have More Legs & a tiny horn on your head, Are you A Spinrack.
1452.title: The Spit Pokemon

14522.content: You awaken covered with white fur with a red zigzag pattern, and notice that you have two large retractable claws on each hand. Are you a Zangoose
14522.title: Cat Ferret

145221.content:
You attempt to open your eyes, but the sun's blinding light prevents you from doing so. You bend your arms as you push yourself into a seated position. you raise your left hand just above your eyes so you could open them without being blinded by the sun's rays.

As you open your eyes, you notice something bizarre, red and white fur. It was covering your entire hand in red and the rest of your arm was covered in white. You were still adjusting to the light, so you weren't sure if what you were seeing was what you thought it was.

As your vision became more clear, you lower your hand and bring the other up a few inching away from your face. What you see leaves you with shock and confusion. What you were staring at were the paws of a Pokemon. Looking down at your chest you see red fur formed in an M-like shape and you immediately recognize the Pokemon you've become. A Zangoose.

"Whaaaaat..." is all you can manage to say. lifting your head and looking around, you notice a conveniently placed pond to your right. You stand up and walk over to water pool. You kneel down in front of it and peer in. You see two pink eyes stare back at you with the same confused look. Looking more intently at your face, you can see that your left ear is completely red and that a bit of the red fur traces down the side of your skull and then shoots back up to make a scar-like appearance over your left eye.

You lift up your left paw and realize that something is missing that you'd often see Zangoose's have, claws. As you look at your paw (and noticing that you have what appears to be the Pokemon equivalent of a thumb), you see that your claws are not see-able. You bring the paw closer to your face and notice that your claws are actually hidden under the red fur.

You remember now that their claws are retractable so as to make running easier when they go on all fours. You try out the retracting claws (after moving them away from your face) and notice that they are relatively easier than you thought. All you had to do was imagine them moving out and with a simple twitch of your paw, the sharp black claws shot out.

Your new feline/mongoose ears detect the rustling of footsteps and a voice that you can't yet distinguish. You quickly stand and turn around, forming what you believed to be a fighting stance, your claws out and ready to attack if necessary. The creature walking into your vision is...
145221.title: Not an Ordinary Zangoose

choices: The Seviper intends to attack you. (Fight.)
All a misunderstanding - why would it need to attack you?
145221221.content:
A huge serpent is slithering towards you, glaring at you with red eyes as it approaches. It is mostly black in colour, with several yellow hexagonal markings on its body, pairs of small bumps of the same colour spread along its underside (which you assume are meant to aid its movement). There are a few purple scar-like marks on it as well, two long, sharp red fangs protruding from its mouth. Its tail is like a blade, the partially red tip being something you do not want to touch. The newcomer is quite clearly a Seviper, your natural rival and enemy - the feud between your kind is well known.

Instinctively, you call out your claws and growl, surprising yourself at how intimidating it sounds. The Seviper comes ever closer, and you prepare yourself for the upcoming battle. Or will it ever happen? Could you be being too quick to assume its intentions?
